name: Moci Over It
description: Use simple controls to control "moci" and reach the summit. Climbing is the accumulation of the past, much like life. Here is the future waiting to be piled up for you and the life of moci. Please join us in reaching the summit.

name: Crossroads OS
description: Explore the mysterious operating system Crossʀoad OS. Adventure through its decaying programs, solve puzzles, collect items and meet strange creatures.

name: Blagmoz
description: Dash, cast, and buff your way to the top of Blagmoz Tower in this lightning-fast PVP precision platformer. Power up by drinking potions, getting kills, and sacrificing your friends at the Altar. Become the ultimate glass cannon in this one-hit-kill battle of sorceries!

name: I commissioned some cats 8
description: I paid artists to hide cats and wool in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Arthur & Susan: Almost Detectives
description: Arthur and Susan, two inseparable friends solving mysteries together. Fun and cozy indie point&click. Don't miss it!

name: Harmonic Depths
description: Embark on a relaxing journey in an underwater realm. Glide through captivating environments, embracing the tranquility of exploration and survival found in these Harmonic Depths.

name: Smokey's Rescue Team
description: Smokey's Rescue Team is a cat rescue/adoption simulator that allows you to interact and look after cats that have been abandoned in front of your home. You will need to take care of all the cats and make sure they are fed and happy until you can find them a new home.

name: Knight Speed
description: Embark on an epic medieval adventure in this fast-paced endless runner. As a valiant knight, leap across perilous towers, skillfully shoot down enemies with your trusty bow, and protect your kingdom while racing against the relentless passage of time.

name: Red Antz
description: Put the ants on your body

name: Bestial Reception
description: In the game "Bestial Reception" the strongest survives, grab a weapon and start running towards the enemy. Shoot and destroy everyone who happens to be near you. Get new more powerful weapons with the help of earned gold.

name: Crossroad OS
description: Crossʀoad OS is a single-player adventure where you solve puzzles, meet strange creatures and explore a sacred operating system created as a junction between the human and spirit world.

name: Dot to Dot Sweep
description: Go for the high score in this arcade-style color matching action game. Maneuver your character through fields of colored dots collecting those that match your color.

name: Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra
description: Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra is a hidden object game where you need to find musician dogs that are embarassed to play their music. It's like Shy Cats Hidden Orchesta, when you find them, they will play songs for you.

name: Chiki-Chiki
description: Chiki-Chiki is a multiplayer racing game staged in the colorful reefs of Batabada. This frenzic gameplay based on physics will make you want to challenge all of your friends & family through a smashing versus experience. Make sure you samba hard.

name: The Dark Tones: Loss
description: Sooner or later we all have to make a choice and live with it, are you ready to make your own in order to achieve the goal at any cost regardless of the consequences?

name: Paradise Lust 2
description: Continue your adventures on Tuvatuva island in a sultry 2D point-and-click adventure where romance blooms, fish are caught, drinks are served, puzzles are solved, and passion ignites in paradise.

name: Sky Runners Infinite: Parkour
description: "Sky Runners Infinite: Parkour" is the ultimate cyberpunk endless runner game that will leave you breathless!. Parkour, slide, jump, and dodge obstacles while collecting coins to buy new clothes, weapons, and upgrades.

name: Resident Evil 4: VR Mode
description:
Experience the ultimate immersive experience as Leon S. Kennedy takes on a grueling rescue mission!

Resident Evil 4 is a remake of the 2005 original Resident Evil 4 reimagined for 2023 to bring state-of-the-art survival horror. Resident Evil 4 preserves the essence of the original game, while introducing modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline,
and vividly detailed graphics to make this the latest survival horror game where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect.

name: The Rusty Longsword
description: Join Rana, a cute gnome, on a whimsical adventure up a magical island in this enchanting 3D pixel art game. Meet new friends, collect treasures, and unlock secrets along the way!

name: Nevermind This
description: Step into the world of "Nevermind this", a hurt-pumping horror where confusion, chaos, fear, distraction and even fun come together for an unique game experience, in a cursed hut from old Lumberjack. Don't let them mess with your mind.

name: El Panadero: The Baker
description: Action Packed 2D Arcade Action Platformer featuring hand-drawn graphics. Armed with your fists (or a rolling pin) and a variety of bread-based boosts, fend of the the Alien Plants, and avenge the Bakery they destroyed.

name: Another Dungeon Game
description: Battle your way through this 2D Action RPG Dungeon Crawler with over-the-top skills, extensive passive trees, and all the randomized loot you can carry! Another Dungeon Game has been designed with casual players in mind, making it quick and easy to dive right in and start slaying from level 1.

name: Monster Loves You Too!
description: Live the life of a Monster within a society of fantastic creatures. Hunt for food, make friends and allies, and battle your own instincts in order to rise above your humble origins in the sequel to the best-selling Monster Loves You!

name: Garbage Crew!
description: Garbage Crew! is a game about chaos! You work in a team with two to four players and an angry garbage truck driver. Your job is to empty garbage cans and containers. Sadly, your contract doesn't state what kind of work you are required to do, so your boss loads you with all kinds of extra tasks, including firefighting and forest work. Naturally you are completely understaffed, and your short-tempered driver has no intention of stopping the truck to wait for you, just because you couldn't empty all the garbage cans while extinguishing a raging wildfire. Luckily, there are heaps of powerups that help you with all those tasks, so your stress level won't reach dangerous heights... Or so you thought! Due to an accident in your bosses DIY time reverting device, you travel back into medieval times with seemingly no way to return and to make matters worse, your contract states that you are still required to work! So better get yourself a sword because the town is in the middle of a siege!

name: Abtos Covert
description: You are in a remote military outpost at Mount Abtos and you're tasked to guard it. The only things visible from there are an old shrine and the forest. Many are afraid of this infamous outpost because of the local folklore stories. Actually, too many stories....will you be safe, all alone?

name: Against the Storm
description: A roguelite city builder set in a fantasy world tormented by the everlasting rain. Settle the unknown wilds to discover and rebuild the ruins of a long-forgotten civilization. Develop technologies that will help your citizens tackle destructive storms and extend the frontier of your civilization.

name: Espresso for the Demon
description: A new coffee shop suddenly opened in the city. On-time, because Visa really needs a moonlighting. She gets a job with her classmates: cheerful Frank and quiet Estr. What could possibly be wrong?

name: Back Then
description:
We all live with the fear of reaching the shadow of dementia. The ultimate fear of forgetting. The fear of not remembering our past, what led us here. For who do we become when we forget who we are?

Back Then is a first-person narrative game journey taking place in the mind of Thomas Eilian, an elderly writer diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease. The gameplay, presented in first-person perspective, is story-driven and is heavily focused on interactions, puzzles and detective exploration.

name: Pinball FX: Charity Pack
description: Your purchase of Epic Quest and Excalibur brings joy to those in need & helps preserve pinball culture. Join Max the knight in championing charity!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Deluxe Pack
description: THE FIRST CLASSIC CRPG IN THE WARHAMMER 40,000 UNIVERSE

name: Crash Team Rumble: Season 3
description: All Fired Up was the third and final season of Crash Team Rumble, it began on the 7th of December 2023 and ended on the 4th of March 2024. This season was themed around the Spyro series.

name: Endure the Swarm
description: The Swarm only moves when you do. Plan carefully, and take your time. But beware, it will destroy every door, window, and fence standing it its way to get to you. Topple furniture, flip tables, and drag boxes to survive in over 50 devious levels in this new turn based twist on the block pushing genre.

name: Tambor Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Dwarf
description:
You are a dwarf on a mission to mine as much gold as possible. You start your day deep down in the mines when suddenly... lava starts bursting from the exit above.

The only way to survive, is to go down! How deep can you go ?

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Special Edition
description: Enhance your game experience with the Special Edition and get access to the Sarentu Heritage Cosmetic Pack including a premium Na'vi weapon skin, one character cosmetic set, and a banshee cosmetic set.

name: Sadturn
description: A short autobiographical maze game. It's 2171. You are a human born in the Saturnian shellworld, a habitational megastructure built between the icy rocks in Saturn's rings. Searching for a life as a sailor, you embark on a journey to Earth.

name: Chordata
description: Sin descripción

name: Avenger
description: Retake the ultimate weapon - Volos - from the Alliance!

name: Gaiares
description: Mother Earth faces unprecedented environmental destruction at the hands of human activity. Can Earth be saved?!

name: Granada
description: The legend of Granada. Only those who've seen it know the truth.

name: Psychic Storm
description: Humanity's last hopes ride on the Stormbringer super weapons as they journey throughout the Milky Way. Can they succeed?!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Voidfarer Pack
description: Made in a close partnership with Games Workshop, Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is a story-rich classical RPG from Owlcat Games, developers of the critically acclaimed game, Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous.

name: Escape the Arcade
description: A casual escape room game for Playdate

name: G-Mode Archives 53: Daienkai Buchou
description:
Aim to be the biggest banquet manager in Japan!! Let's liven up the banquet with partitions and care!

"Daienkai Buchou" is a collection of mini-games based on the motif of Japanese salaryman culture "Banquet".

Let's play unique and varied mini-games to liven up various banquets such as year-end parties, New Year's parties, cherry blossom viewing, barbecues, etc., and improve the skills of the secretary!
In addition to "Drinkers" who pour beer into the mug, "Sashi-turning" to help with entertainment, etc., all 9 types of mini-games full of seasonal feeling such as "Cherry Blossom Viewing", "Nagashi Somen" and "Fireworks Festival".

Also, let's collect bingo prizes with bingo tickets that you can get when you get a high score.
Depending on the degree of collection of prizes and the score of the game, the title of banquet manager will be increased! Please aim for the ultimate title!

name: Please, Don't Touch Anything: House Broken
description: Please, Don't Touch Anything: House Broken is an all-new mind-bending evolution in the hit puzzle game series. Play in mixed reality for a blend of the real and unreal, or enjoy full VR mode, or better yet try both! From simple to devious puzzles - explore, interact, and embrace the truly unexpected!

name: Medieval Dynasty: Co-Op Mode
description:
Medieval Dynasty expands with Co-Op map for up to 4 players.

Medieval Dynasty's new co-operative map, The Oxbow, introduces a new exciting location that will also feature enigmatic characters, captivating landmarks and charming villages. Leading the way is Piastovia, the heart and soul of the Oxbow where your epic journey begins.

name: American Truck Simulator: Michelin Fan Pack
description: We're thrilled to present a fresh collection of truck tires and accessories, officially licensed from Michelin for American Truck Simulator. To enhance the experience, we've added a variety of "aftermarket" goodies and paint jobs, creating a blend that's sure to bring joy to any Michelin enthusiast.

name: Otherworld Legends: Skin - Mint & Sea Salt Millefeuille
description: This content requires the base game Otherworld Legends 战魂铭人 on Steam in order to play.

name: For Honor: Highlander Hero Skin - Oathbreaker Maddox
description: Become a treacherous survivor with the Oathbreaker Maddox Hero Skin, a full body customization of the Highlander.

name: Ghostrunner II: Ice Pack
description: Equip the chilling power of the cybernetic future today with Ghostrunner 2's first DLC, the Ice Pack! Brace yourself for a bone-chilling experience, with a web-inspired twist that will redefine the way you hack and slash through the neon-lit cityscape.

name: Pinball FX: Star Trek Pinball
description: Boldly go, where no one has gone before in Star Trek Pinball! Explore 3 tables based on the fan favorite movies and TV series of the franchise ranging from classics to the present day, and live long and prosper on the leaderboards!

name: Pinball FX: Game Night Pinball Volume 1
description: "Get ready for a game-changing experience as Zen Studios partners up with Asmodee to bring you three tables based on the best tabletop games. Step into a new realm of pinball, and remember, just like with the dice, a single flip can change everything. "

name: Pinball FX: A Charlie Brown Christmas Pinball
description: Find the real meaning of Christmas in A Charlie Brown Christmas Pinball! Join the Peanuts crew in putting on a play and decorating the most perfect tree there is.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Deluxe Edition
description: THE FIRST CLASSIC CRPG IN THE WARHAMMER 40,000 UNIVERSE

name: M.A.D. Cows
description: M.A.D. Cows is an exciting, retro, action platform game. Mow down aliens. Buy better guns. Rescue cows, dogs, raccoons, and more.

name: Thrilling Stories Collection
description: Explore the depths of suspense, adventure, and intrigue. Immerse yourself in fascinating worlds, solve captivating mysteries and discover extraordinary stories.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Voidfarer Edition
description: This is the Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader ultimate experience! Jump into the Koronus Expanse sufficiently prepared and with symbols of powers that suits your status!

name: Arcade Archives: Pole Position II
description:
"POLE POSITION II" is a racing game released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment) in 1983.
The game is divided into qualifying and grand prix. If you make a lap in the qualifying round with a good time, you will advance to the grand prix.
In addition, new courses have been added to this title.
Aim for pole position on four different courses!

name: A Posteriori
description: An experience where you traverse through a fever dream.

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Complete Edition
description: Dig your claws into the complete Metal: Hellsinger experience with the base game and all DLCs, containing more original and licensed music, new weapons, and new outfits.

name: Terminal Voltage
description: Terminal Voltage is a new episode of electric maps for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Birdo's Holiday Brawl
description: Take control of Birdo to rescue her friends from Wart and the Eight Bits before the Subcon Holidays!

name: LEGO Fortnite: Odyssey
description:
Explore vast, open worlds where the magic of LEGO building and Fortnite collide.
​​​​Collect food and resources, craft items​, build shelter and battle enemies solo or​ team up​ with up to seven friends.

​Get creative in building and ​customizing​​​ your ultimate home base​ using LEGO elements collected from the world around you​, then recruit villagers to gather materials and help survive the night. Gear up and drop into deep caves in search of rare resources and hidden areas.

Find the ultimate survival crafting LEGO adventure in Fortnite! The journey is only just beginning with new world building, gameplay features, and more LEGO Style Outfits arriving in updates starting early 2024.

name: GTFO: The Final Chapter
description: Bringing the story of the four prisoners to an end in the most GTFO way possible. This time is different/same. The right/wrong place with the wrong/right people. How low/high will you/they go before you start/stop following orders? This is the end/beginning.

name: Epic Roller Coasters: SpongeBob SquarePants
description: Epic Roller Coasters and Nickelodeon bring you the most phenomenal roller coaster combo ever in the funniest place across the ocean.

name: Dream Sketcher: The Lost Opera
description: This DLC includes 1 new script The Lost Opera, 1 new investigator "Mercenary" Diana, and 30 new cards.

name: DJMax Respect V: V Extension V Pack
description: Meet the 'V Original Music' package now!

name: Sands of Salzaar: Land of the Eclipse
description: This DLC includes three expansion contents: "The Eclipse Hive", "Exotic Wayfarer", and "Siege and Conquest"; each can be loaded/removed independently in the game.

name: My Universe Collection
description:
In this bundle, find 3 games from the My Universes series, including:

My Universe : My Baby - a realistic baby simulation. Time to become a parent! Take care of your newborn boy or girl, keep them happy and help them learn new skills.

My Universe : Interior Designer - become the most renowned interior designer in town and create your dream home..

My Universe : School Teacher - become the best teacher in town! Play as a young teacher with a mission: bringing your new school back to the top!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Starbound Painter
description:
Version 7.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of Part 1.5 of the main story, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Cosmic Expression (Griseo)
• New Story Chapter XLII: Earthbound Order
• New Featured Event: Starry Voyage: Strike Back!
• UI Overhaul
• ...and more!

name: LEGO Bricktales
description: In LEGO Bricktales, discover an innovative brick-by-brick building mechanic to design puzzle solutions from your own imagination. See your creations brought to life in a beautiful LEGO world where every problem has a constructive resolution.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Meow Wolf
description: Putt through portals of possibility in this wondrous, kaleidoscopic world of fun-filled play. Explore a fantastically vibrant environment full of curious creatures, whimsical gameplay mechanics, and limitless invitations to expand your game—and your mind. Now open if you are.

name: The Last Soldier of the Ming Dynasty
description: The Japanese pirates have terrorized the Ming Dynasty for generations. You've devoted your life as a soldier to fighting them.And now you are in their turf, alone with your sword; the last soldier in pirate's land in this 3D-action game inspired by traditional Chinese ink painting landscapes.

name: Stone Age
description:
Stone Age is a 2D action game.
Control a primitive man and command your companions to gather fruits and vegetables and hunt animals.
If the level goes up, the primitive man will power up. Weapons will gradually increase.
Increase the number of friends, defeat strong enemies, and develop the village!

name: Erogods: Asgard
description: Erogods: Asgard - is a dating simulator with feminized Norse gods.

name: Golden Rails: Harvest of Riddles
description: A new adventure awaits in Golden Rails: Harvest of Riddles. Join the dynamic duo, Jack and Jill, as they answer the call of a mayor that is seeking help to organize a grand fair in the midst of a web of deceit, corruption and darkness.

name: Defend the Base: Tower Turret Shooting Range
description: The turret is ready, shooter! Demonstrate your marksmanship skills, defend your base from invaders and complete the tower defense simulator!

name: 3D Watermelon Game
description: Match fruit and get the high-score in this 3D Watermelon matching game! Try out 3 unqiue game modes and make your PERFECT smoothie!

name: Problemlöser
description: Take control of the new IT trainee in this 2D action game and avoid collisions with the IT professionals. Debug scripts to find bugs to squeeze. More administrators are waiting for you in each level. Remember, your time is limited! If that sounds too easy, try 8 different difficulty levels.

name: Cute Cats Slide
description: I love cats, you love cats, who doesn't love cats. Have fun with this classic slide puzzle with lots of cute cats.

name: Endless Glory
description: Lead your army to endless glory

name: SCP-087-B UE Remake
description: SCP-087-B UE Remake is a free single-player horror experience which seeks to recreate many aspects of the 2012 game SCP-087-B made by Joonas Rikkonen while keeping the charm and feel of the original.

name: Hidden Western Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: The Witches Pond
description: The Witches Pond is a horror-adventure game based on the real-life place with the same name. Enter a world of mystery and strange places where you will experience events that may or may not seem real.

name: Grandfather Simulator
description: Open the door to Grandfather's life! Watch TV series, play with the dog, argue with your wife, take pills, eat lunch, sleep, go for a walk. Live the measured life of a grandfather, where every day is an adventure, and routine is an art!

name: Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks
description: Race through the skies, master aerial stunts, and unlock cars in Skyline Sprint: Turbo Tracks. Collect stars, conquer levels, and enhance immersion with optional Perspectacles head tracking glasses. Become the champion of high-speed, airborne racing! Pick a car and give it a Go!

name: Vigaro Runner
description: Player is Vigaro pill and his mission is to avoid traps and use platforms to find star and finish levels

name: City Driver: Car Parking Simulator
description: You are a parking attendant and you need to release all the road users in the right order in our parking simulator!

name: Fire Fly
description: It's an intense,adrenaline-pumping zombie mowing game where youll overcome many odds to find a cure.The game is not finished yet,and I will do my best to complete this game in the future,learn from the feedback,increase the gameplay,and make sure that it does not disappoint each and every one of you

name: A Army Base
description: 2D side-scrolling shooting, 5-player local cooperative combat, base defense, zombie survival, firearms, melee weapons, vehicles, and mechs.

name: Soldier Yōki
description: Soldier Yōki, is an indie, action, and third-person shooter game. Solo or in cooperation, up to 4 players, explore the different settings, with diverse gaming experiences. Face the Extraterrestrial alliance and defeat the Boss in order to win the game.

name: Yama no Susume: Next Summit - Ano Yama ni, Mou Ichido
description: Sin descripción

name: Crystal Chip Collector e
description: Fast-paced platforming puzzle game about an ancient spirit that fixes PCs.

name: Midnight Blanc
description: A horror game where you pilot a crude airplane over the North Atlantic.

name: Hotel in the Dark
description: That's the day it all started on Sept. 13. 2020. In the early morning of the same day, I was already standing at the bus station, waiting for my bus. I had to travel a couple of three hundred kilometers to a small town. I found a hotel quickly. It was quite a modern building at first glance.

name: Powers in the Basement
description: A short point-and-click adventure game set in a comedic medieval fantasy world, deliberately reminiscent of the great classics from the 80s / 90s, with a specific sweet spot for LucasArts production.

name: Northgard: Vordr, Clan of the Owl
description: Subsisting through the ages, the secretive norns of Vördr keep watch over all realms in Northgard and beyond. Protectors of Yggdrasil, the sisters Skuld, Verdandi, and Urdr, use the power of this sacred tree to spread their knowledge inexorably across the land.

name: Pestersim
description: The complete MSPA Reader Saga in one bundle - Hiveswap Friendsim and Pesterquest

name: Sunsoft Mahjong Solitaire: Shanghai Legend
description: The 30-Year King of Puzzle Games: Shanghai

name: A Date with Death: Expansion DLC
description:
The expansion DLC for A Date with Death includes:

- Extra character customization options (five hair fronts, five hair backs, three fem outfits + recolors, four masc outfits + recolors, and 13 accessories)
- Adds extra choices and conversations throughout all days (find the ★ symbol!)
- Adds one additional ending (including a new CG!)

name: Carsick Carventure
description: Carsic Carventure is a simple hyper-casual game where you drive your 2D car as far as possible. Discover new places, set new records, and beat your friends! Enjoy infinite levels and different game modes!

name: Bugs N' Guns
description: Bugs N' Guns is a cooperative third person shooter. Player will need to combine their weapons firepower to eliminate enemies and obstacles as players try to protect a train called MARC - OS from hostile flora and fauna.

name: Shadow Strike: Street Combat
description: Enter the heart-pounding world of Shadow Strike: Street Combat on Steam! Engage in 3D side-scrolling combat, navigating gritty urban landscapes. Master diverse combat techniques, customize your fighter, and gear up for an unparalleled urban battleground. Are you ready to dominate the streets?

name: Slam Dunk Basketball
description: Elevate your basketball game with Slam Dunk Basketball. Precision controls, Perspectacles' 3D views, and strategic gameplay redefine virtual sports. Customize, rise through ranks and experience the fusion of tech and hoops excitement. Lace up, don Perspectacles, and revolutionize your virtual game!

name: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier Collection III
description: A Japanese-only collection of Valis games for Switch.

name: Diamond Dash: Plaid Peril
description: Dive into Diamond Dash: Plaid Peril, a unique rolling ball game for Perspectacles 3D glasses. Conquer the perilous plaid path, collect diamonds, and leap between tracks. Challenge levels and global competition await. Experience gaming in a visually stunning world.

name: Touhou Meijinka: Song of Divine Tempest
description: A thunderous concert appears...

name: Sona-Nyl of the Violet Shadows Refrain
description: The 5th entry in Liarsoft's Steampunk visual novel series is a mysterious fairytale in which fantasy and reality intertwine. The story unfolds from the perspectives of 2 women: one who travels in the ruins of Engine City New York, and one who finds herself in an underground wolrd with a violet sky.

name: Journey's Land
description: Journey's Land is an upcoming Action RPG game in which the player will have to save a land from an underworld force that has come back to life.

name: Infinity Sky
description: In "Infinity Sky," navigate a thrilling aerial journey, dodging skyscrapers and collecting rings of fire. Conquer endless challenges, compete globally, and experience immersive gaming with Perspectacles. Are you ready for high-flying excitement?

name: Parcel Mania
description: A multiplayer party game that supports up to 4 players! Compete with your friends to reach the highest score in this one and only Delivery Royale, PARCEL MANIA!

name: Gridmaster
description: Step into the world of Gridmaster, a high-speed single-player racer. Take on time trials, master the art of drifting, and compete on the leaderboards. As you dominate the road, unlock new cars and tracks to fuel your journey to victory!

name: The Sims 4: For Rent
description: Bring the neighbours together (literally) and experience multi-family lots as a tenant or property owner in The Sims 4 For Rent Expansion Pack. Purchase now to get bonus items** to bring the Night Market home for your Sims.

name: Homage: Godless Grotto
description: Venture into the unforgiving caverns under the mountain on an impossible quest in this high-fantasy split screen roleplaying game.

name: Meadow: Zebra and Hyena Skin Pack
description: Transform the look of your favourite animals in Meadow! This pack contains two new skins: one Zebra skin for the Goat and one Hyena skin for the Wolf.

name: Retro Blaster: Mech Madness 1
description: A single-player platformer and puzzle adventure through a colorful world of mecha madness, created by solo developer Kusuma Putra.

name: Hot Love Dreams: Classic Hentai Logic Puzzle
description: Charming girls are already waiting for you in our hot and tempting puzzle game!

name: Dreamers: A Nostalgic Adventure
description: Dreamers will lead you on an emotional journey in a story about friendship, exploration, and personal growth. Join the three characters in their adventure through a 3D world with secondary storylines and mini-games, vehicles to upgrade, puzzles to solve, and collaborative split-screen experiences.

name: Shape Tunnel
description: Welcome to Shape Tunnel: A Dimensional Challenge! Prepare for a mind-bending journey through twisting tunnels and geometric puzzles. Match your shape to the ever-changing tunnel by deftly rotating the shapes. Precision and quick thinking are your allies. Conquer this challenge!

name: Island Rush
description: Welcome to Island Rush: Surfing Odyssey! Dive into an adventure where sun-kissed waves meet the thrill of the unknown. Choose your avatar, surf to a distant island, and overcome perilous obstacles. Every moment counts - swift action is your key to avoiding destruction.

name: Momon: Relic Seekers
description: Momon: Relic Seekers is a card battle game with roguelite elements, which takes place in the Tsuki universe. Help Tsuki recover her world, collect the relics, build your deck and fight monsters with the help of your Momons.

name: Once Upon a Time There was a Twin-Tailed Sister Princess Who Was Very Unfriendly.
description: Sin descripción

name: Runemancer
description: Runemancer is a strategic party-based RPG game where you match runes to empower your team mates. Fight hordes of enemies and unlock new powers in this fast-paced single-player game.

name: Petey Pedro Unbeetable Adventure
description: A nostalgic game for those RAD 80's and 90's kids. Help Petey Pedro get back home after falling into a magical world where the sweets he chose over a healthy beet are now his worst nightmare.

name: Aerodangle
description: Aerodangle is a chaotic mix of high-speed flying, parkour with a grappling hook and a stream of airplanes falling apart in the air.

name: Rasen Reijoh Spiral Ojosama: Chohatsu no Makina
description: A "vertical roll, horizontal scroll" action game where you take control of Lady Makina, a young girl with martial arts and drill hair grappling powers, on a mission to rescue her father from haywire robots in a research facility.

name: Awesome Pea 3
description: Awesome Pea is a fast precision platformer where you must run&jump through a series of challenging stages

name: Seybul Tech
description: Seybul Tech is a walking simulator. Navigate as an office employee, confronting peculiar encounters while in search of an exit from this enigmatic abyss.

name: DoDonPachi Dai-Ou-Jou Re:Incarnation
Sky Sojourn
description: Welcome to the world of Sky Sojourn! You are an adventurer who embarks on an amazing journey overcoming obstacles on floating islands. Will you be able to conquer the peaks and reach your goal? Get ready for an unforgettable climb full of amazing discoveries!

name: Hollow Cocoon
description: "Trapped in a cocoon, the silkworm weaves her final dream." Hollow Cocoon is a first-person horror adventure game set in 1980s Japan. Immerse yourself in meticulously recreated environments as you venture into the depths of unspeakable horrors that await you.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Gold Edition
description: With the Gold Edition, get the game and Season Pass including two Story Packs, a bonus quest, a unique banshee, and more! Discover what it means to be Na'vi as you join other clans to protect Pandora from the formidable forces of the RDA.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Limited Edition
description:
Enhance your game experience with the Limited Edition and get access to the Sarentu Hunter Equipment Pack including one unique weapon and one character gear set only at Amazon.
Explore a world of wonder and danger. Experience the epic wonders of the Western Frontier, a never-before-seen continent of Pandora. Journey through beautiful yet unpredictable open world regions, where lowering your guard can lead to deadly mistakes.
Become Na’vi. Harness your incredible strength and agility while customizing your character; crafting new gear and upgrading skills and weapons to fit your playstyle.
Soar the skies. Bond with your own personal banshee that will give you an edge in aerial combat and can be used for traveling across the vast Western Frontier.
Master multiple combat styles. Fight off the dangers of Pandora as you embrace the precision of traditional Na’vi weapons, including your bow and spear-thrower, or leverage your human training with more destructive weapons, such as an assault rifle or a shotgun.

name: A Date with Death
description: Fight against and romance the one hunting for your soul in A Date with Death, a chat simulator visual novel where you date the Grim Reaper himself. Create your own character, decorate your apartment, and chat away with the charming yet dangerous Grim Reaper through fully voiced video calls.

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - Ultimate Edition
description: Includes the game, Season Pass, Ultimate Pack, and digital artbook.* Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is set in the never-before-seen Western Frontier. Discover what it means to be Na'vi as you join other clans to protect Pandora from the formidable forces of the RDA.

name: Wallace & Gromit: The Grand Getaway
description: Wallace and Gromit: The Grand Getaway is a brand-new VR adventure involving the famous Aardman animated duo.

name: Fall of the New Age: Collector's Edition
description: Find your little brother in this adventure!

name: Arizona Sunshine II
description: Dust off your shotgun and sharpen your machete. Accompanied by an all-new friend, Arizona Sunshine 2 takes you back to the limb-strewn deserts of post-apocalyptic Arizona in this gory, next-gen sequel to one of VR's most-played games.

name: Evotales
description: Evotales is a puzzle-platformer about our gilled ancestor who decided to lead the rise of mankind

name: Hexceed: Finis
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Finis Puzzle your way through 143 new levels - levels include all mechanics from Years 1 and 2!

name: Maze Nuts
description: Chase the golden nut through the always changing maze against up to 3 other players. Use certain strategies to prevent the others catch it before you do.

name: Nessy the... Robot
description: Fight your way through zombified robots, slime creatures, and a multitude of other enemies & bosses, as well as a plethora of levels, secrets & easter eggs to discover, collectible gems to... well... collect, as well as characters & dogs to talk to.

name: Kip and Odosan
description: Help Kip run, jump, shoot, swim, and fly her way through the galaxy to save her kidnapped Cat Odosan in this hand-crafted platforming mashup. Explore 15 unique levels of platforming challenges through a variety of game play types and unique levels and learn the mystery about who you really are.

name: Guts 'n Grunts
description: Inspired by games like Contra and Turrican, Guts 'n Grunts is a mid-paced action game with lots of shooting, swimming, and rolling. Find power-ups. Earn upgrades. Fight for pig freedom!

name: Silence Channel 2
description: We always search for truth while awake, but truth can be found in our nightmares…

name: The Finals
description: Join The Finals, the world-famous, free-to-play, combat-centered game show! Fight alongside your teammates in virtual arenas that you can alter, exploit, and even destroy. Build your own playstyle in this first-person shooter to win escalating tournaments and lasting fame. Can you reach The Finals?

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader
description: You will take on the role of a Rogue Trader, a scion of an ancient dynasty of daring privateers, that reign over their own merchant empire and explore the fringes of Imperial space with the blessing of the Emperor Himself. Thanks to their Warrant of Trade - the Rogue Trader is endowed with privileges and power beyond imagination as well as the task of expanding the borders of the Imperium. At their disposal is a gargantuan voidship of immense power and innumerable servants and personnel ready to do the bidding of their lord. Their adventures begin in the vast Koronus Expanse - a treacherous region of unexplored space at the edge of Humanity’s domain.

name: Railroader
description: You and your fellow railroaders are the lifeblood of your railroad, just like it is the lifeblood of the communities it serves. Switch cars at industries. Keep people moving while running local passenger trains. Run trains with a purpose in transition era Appalachia – in Railroader!

name: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora
description: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is a first-person, action-adventure game set in the never-before-seen Western Frontier of Pandora. Abducted by the human militaristic corporation known as the RDA, you, a Na’vi, were trained and molded to serve their purpose. Fifteen years later, you are free, but find yourself a stranger in your birthplace. Reconnect with your lost heritage, discover what it truly means to be Na'vi, and join other clans to protect Pandora from the RDA.

name: Lies Under Ice
description: The ice moon of Europa calls. Will your base sink into ocean? Succumb to sabotage and intrigue? Or will you set the stage for humanity among the stars?

name: Evil Nun: The Broken Mask
description: “Evil Nun: The Broken Mask” is a horror game in which you have to escape from Sister Madeline, a nun who punishes children with her gigantic hammer. You will have to escape from the school at all costs, although along the way you will discover that you are not the only child trapped. You will have to solve all kinds of puzzles and mysteries to complete the game and end this nightmare forever.

name: The Day Before
description: The Day Before is an open-world MMO survival set in a deadly, post-pandemic America overrun by flesh-hungry infected and survivors killing each other for food, weapons, and cars. You wake up alone in a world you no longer remember, setting out to find answers and the resources to survive.

name: Undying
description: Infected by a zombie bite, Anling's days are numbered. She must now fight to survive, not for herself but her young son, Cody. Ensure Cody's survival in this zombie infested world by protecting him, searching for safety, and teaching him valuable skills, at any cost.

name: Throne and Liberty
description: Throne and Liberty is a free-to-play MMORPG that takes place in the vast open world of Solisium. Explore a land full of depth and opportunity, scale expansive mountain ranges for new vantage points, scan the open skies, and traverse sprawling plains. Adapt your fight to survive and thrive through strategic decisions in PvP, PvE or both as you encounter evolving battlefields impacted by weather, time of day, and other players. There is no single path to victory as you seek to defeat Kazar and claim the throne while keeping rival guilds at bay.

name: Drums Rock: Simple Plan - 'Welcome to My Life'
description: Get the track 'Welcome to My Life' from Simple Plan! This track is part of the 'Simple Plan Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Simple Plan - 'Time to Say Goodbye'
description: Get the track 'Time to Say Goodbye' from Simple Plan! This track is part of the 'Simple Plan Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Simple Plan - 'Shut Up!'
description: Get the track 'Shut Up!' from Simple Plan! This track is part of the 'Simple Plan Music Pack'.

name: Drums Rock: Simple Plan - 'Crazy'
description: Get the track 'Crazy' from Simple Plan! This track is part of the 'Simple Plan Music Pack'.

name: Who Shot James R. Burnside?
description: Use your deductive skills to solve the mystery of who shot James R.Burnside!

name: thread and Needle
description: A mixed up conversation between a mixed up spy and his informant.

name: Eternal Paradox
description: Eternal Paradox is a mobile 4X strategy game with turn-based RPG elements. Gather resources, build armies and forge alliances in the player-driven world of Elysium. Compete for rewards within a unique seasonal system where progress is periodically reset.

name: Crash Team Rumble
description: Crash Team Rumble is a promotional tie-in game by McDonald's made as a part of their Crash Team Rumble Happy Meal campaign.

name: Snap! A Cerrado Adventure
description: Explore Brazil's beautiful Cerrado region, meet the creatures who live there, and experience a future made possible by conservation and habitat restoration.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 27
description: A new rotation strategy after careful consideration of player feedback regarding our map rotation system. Rotations will now vary between map selection and random map regions.

name: Star Crossed
description:
Meet Clara, the kind barmaid with a secret identity that lurks beneath the surface of her everyday life, and Laila, a determined policewoman devoted to upholding what little justice is left a city plagued by corruption and misogyny.

As Clara and Laila's paths collide, the lines between ally and adversary become obscured. Clara, torn between her duty to the rebellion against Father, leader of the regime, and the unexpected emotions bubbling within her heart. Laila, committed to her duty, will find herself drawn to the mysterious barmaid in ways that may challenge her convictions.

Will Clara follow her heart or will duty prevail over desire? Explore the depths of love, betrayal, and sacrifice in this visual novel where the choices you make will shape their destiny!

- Mostly linear, with a couple of flavour choices and a single story-changing one
- 2 different endings
- Made for Yuri Game Jam 2023 by Star Derailed Team (tentative group name that stuck)

Content Warnings: Dictatorship, Violence, Torture, Emotional abuse, Explicit language

name: Tharaba
description: Dive into the exhilarating world of Tharaba, Time Each Hit Perfectly and compete for the highest score.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Bring the Boom Edition
description:
The AEW: Fight Forever Bring the Boom deluxe edition includes the main game PLUS access to Matt Hardy, Broken Matt Hardy and Seasons 1 and 2 DLC, totaling 10 wrestlers, 4 mini-games, a new arena, an all-new tournament mode AND 10 new tracks. More details below:

- The AEW: Fight Forever Matt Hardy Pack which features two of the many Matt Hardys: Mat Hardy and Broken Matt Hardy
- The AEW: Fight Forever FTR: Revival Pack which features AEW wrestlers Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler PLUS minigames JoinUs and Deth Race-X
- The AEW: Fight Forever Limitless Bunny Bundle which features AEW wrestlers The Bunny and Keith Lee PLUS minigames MJF Car Thrash and Sloth Sling
- The AEW: Fight Forever Hookhausen Very Handsome, Very Evil Pack which featues AEW wrstlers HOOK and Danhausen.
- The AEW: Fight Forever Dynamite Featuring The Acclaimed DLC which features the boldest Tag Team in AEW history, Anthony Bowens and Max Caster of The Acclaimed, PLUS the brand new Dynamite themed arena.
- The AEW: Fight Forever Beat the Elite DLC which features an all-new gameplay mode, Beat the Elite. Beat the Elite introduces single-player, offline tournament competition to the most competitive Fight Forever players.
- The AEW: Fight Forever The Storm is Coming DLC which features the legendary women's wrestling champion from down under Toni Storm. Storm joins the Fight Forever playable roster along with 10 new tracks.

name: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew – Complete Edition
description: The Complete Edition includes the Main Game, the DLC expansions Shadow Gambit: Yuki's Wish and Shadow Gambit: Zagan's Ritual as well as the Original Soundtrack and the Artbook & Strategy Guide in one package at a special discount price.

name: Holiday Hits
description: Holiday Hits is a limit-removing set of 7 small simple DOOM 2 maps that uses Arsinikk's 2023 updated version of the classic Doom X-Mas pack.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 1
description: Prepare for an incredible Season 1, bringing a massive drop of free and premium content, including five free weapons, four new Multiplayer maps, multiple modes, the next Zombies story mission, the arrival and integration of Call of Duty: Warzone and the new Urzikstan map, an all-new 100+ Tiers of Battle Pass content to earn, BlackCell, and more.

name: Rendsword
description: The roguelike deckbuilding word game.

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Happy Holidays 2023
description: Spread the cheer and make this holiday season extra special in our winter wonderland!

name: Shadow Gambit: Zagan's Ritual
description: "Zagan the Apostate" is inviting you to his ominous laboratory. Recruit the zealous scientist and former Inquisition member to your crew, set sail to an eldritch castle island and experience a new campaign. Will you unveil the secrets of the Inquisition's holy flame?

name: Tales of Arise: Elegant Costume Pack
description: The Elegant Costume Pack contains costumes and attachments for Alphen and Shionne, exclusive cooking recipes, and food items.

name: Shadow Gambit: Yuki's Wish
description: Yuki and Kuma from Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun return! Recruit them to your pirate crew, explore the enchanted Japanese island “Dragon's Dream”, and experience six new story missions. Will you solve the dragon's riddle and fulfill Yuki's wish?

name: Neon Odyssey
description: Players will solve complex mazes, interact with intense arcade action, and rescue Dr. Harris aboard an AI controlled space station.

name: Egression: The Lobby Runaround
description: Hello Escapers! We have heard your requests for more content, and we are back to deliver another round of puzzles. The next time you enter Egression, Inc., you will find a bunch of changes throughout the lobby and hallways. And so, we immediately welcome you to your new puzzle challenge - The Lobby Runaround!

name: Tiny Archers: Adam’s Tale
description: Draw your bow and defend the Northern Kingdom in this immersive VR tower defense archery game! Step into the role of the realm's finest archer as you face waves of attacks from cunning goblins and ruthless orcs.

name: Grokit: Winter Blast
description: Get into the festive holiday spirit in this Grokit trailer, showcasing what you can expect with the latest update for the mixed reality social multiplayer hand-tracking party game.

name: The Events at Unity Farm: Magic & Melee
description: The new update comes with melee combat, spell enhancements, shrines and stability improvements.

name: Divine Duel: Season 2
description: Season 2 brings a free battle pass and the new playable hero Flint, the Astroravager.

name: Drums Rock: Simple Plan Music Pack
description:
Unleash the power of music with our Simple Plan Music Pack! Experience our latest exclusive bundle featuring an epic collection of songs from iconic bands like Simple Plan. Dive into Simple Plan Music Pack and upgrade your gameplay now!

Content of the Bundle:
- "Welcome to My Life" - Simple Plan
- "Shut Up!" - Simple Plan
- "Crazy" - Simple Plan
- "Time to Say Goodbye" - Simple Plan

name: Rocket League: Season 13
description:
Tape your Season highlights on VHS.
The 90s and early 2000s, a time that was bold, radical, and most importantly: destined to return in Rocket League Season 13! Get ready for reminiscent nights at Mannfield—Season 13 kicks off December 6.

Here’s the 4-1-1 on this Season’s Rocket Pass Premium. Upon purchase, you’ll auto-unlock the Ace Car Body. Go up the Tiers to unlock other new items like the RC Antenna, CRT Wheels, Primo Car Body, yadda yadda yadda…

name: Vampire Survivors: Adventures
description: Adventures are self-contained, mini story-modes that remix the game's content. Aside from providing deep lore , their main goal is actually to give you an excuse to play VS when you feel like it, but have already unlocked everything the game has to offer.

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Purgatory
description:
The Purgatory DLC delivers three new songs, a new weapon, and three searing new looks.

Don the skin that reflects the fire within, then ride the demonic voices of Matt Heafy (Trivium), Melissa Bonny (Ad Infinitum), and Joe Bad (Fit for an Autopsy) as you punctuate each beat with your infernal bow.

name: Sex Simulator: Bar Girls
description: An interactive Sex Simulator game with visual novel elements. Play the role of a gorgeous businesswoman and convince three sexy ladies to get naked with you before making them come.

name: Meadow Gallop
description: Sin descripción

name: Scavenger VR
description: An unknown crack resembling the Mesozoic Era discovered in the near future. Collect dinosaur eggs while avoiding the eyes of dangerous dinosaurs. Collect dinosaur eggs and hatch them to collect dinosaurs!! Collect points to get upgraded and enjoy a great vacation!!

name: Hidden World 10 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Idle Plant Game
description: Idle Plant Game, an idle and offline progress or clicker plant simulation!

name: Nafanya the Poltergeist
description: A game about a house spirit - Houseboy. With the name Nafanya. The player will have to get out of a multi-unit Soviet house, which is run by the Domovoi. To find the way out, you will have to solve riddles from the spirit, and maybe even make friends with him.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Cats
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Cats - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Little Chefs: Co-op
description: Call up your friends and dive into the world of culinary madness where you get to be Little Chefs! Cook dishes, customize and improve your kitchen with the building system, upgrade your character, complete missions and remember: nothing without teamwork, speed and a pinch of madness!

name: Fimbul's Gemboree
description: Collect Gems, explore worlds, and party hardy. You’ll do it all in Fimbul’s Gemboree- a fast-paced adventure platformer. Play as Fimbul, a little ice dragon, and help him run, jump, and roll across lands to collect items that will let him into the best party on the block.

name: Inari
description: Descend from the heavens and slay the evil spirits plaguing Japan in INARI, a side-scrolling hack-and-slash inspired by Japanese folklore. Slice your way through wicked yokai as you run across rooftops, through crowded festival streets, and make your way to the leader of the demonic parade.

name: Four Hunters Survivor
description: Play with four hunters to defeat and survive several hordes of countless enemies, improve your characters to survive more and more and become the most powerful hunter in the world.

name: Natural Craft
description: A funny Blocks Puzzle game.

name: The Spellswapper
description: The Spellswapper is an arcade roguelite where you use spells to defeat waves of enemies. Command an ever-moving arsenal of spells. Swap out old spells for new ones after each wave, crafting a unique magical repertoire in every run.

name: Horny Holiday
description: Dive into a festive romance in Horny Holiday! Play as Jack in a holiday encounter with the enchanting Joy at a Christmas party. Engage in a unique water, fire, wood challenge to win her heart, all wrapped up with captivating animations and a sound. Charm your way to a date before the lights dim!

name: Prepped: Tower Defense
description: Only the paranoid survive, build your defenses and prepare to take on hordes of infected while protecting the trader.

name: Sees Game
description: Play as Sees in a reimagined take of the classic Snake game. Eat apples and compete with your friends for the hi-score!

name: Let's Play! Oink Games: Rafter Five
description: You were supporting it all? Will it collapse!? Will it hold!? Enjoy the strange balancing act in this brainy, balance game!

name: Fragile Love
description: A Chinese-language visual novel.

name: Death by AI
description: Step into a world where AI holds all the cards. Will it be your ally, or will it pull the plug? Choose wisely, because it's not programmed to care! Death by AI is an online prompt based survival multiplayer game to play with your friends, family, community and coworkers on mobile and web.

name: Ballapalooza
description: Roll around and collect rings to progress through several levels with various abilities. Become a true baller!

name: House of Jigsaw: Fantasy
description: Traverse through a variety of imaginative worlds, each offering its own set of magical Fantasy puzzles.

name: Bug & Seek
description: Catch bugs and clues in this cozy bug-catching simulator, styled like an 8-bit classic. You’ve bought the local bug museum, abandoned after a mysterious robbery. Fill orders, build your collection, and upgrade your skills and equipment while exploring Buggburg and uncovering its secrets.

name: Freestyle Ice Skater
description: Freestyle Ice Skater is a casual action/sports game. Your goal is to join the local group of freestyle ice skaters, master your tricks and beat the rival team in an epic freestyle battle.

name: Anx Defense
description: Defend your Nexus by placing mirrors and buildings on the path of your projectiles. Deflect, empower, manage and solve each map using your creative and strategic mind.

name: Battle Stations Blockade
description: Arm the turrets and take aim as you take command of a gunboat in dangerous waters! Battle Stations Blockade is an intense 3D rail shooter presented in voxel style.

name: Chain Reaction
description: Create your own custom chain reactions from scratch or try and explore a variety of set challenges.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel - Northern War
description:
A smartphone RPG based on the anime The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki - Northern War.

In addition to the story of the anime, the mobile game will feature an original story and new characters. The tactical orbment system “ARCUS II” introduced in The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III will also be implemented. Players will be able to explore the world while progressing through the story, and experience the “pure emotion and exhilaration” of the Trails of Cold Steel series’ battles on mobile devices.

name: Doom Sweeper
description: Doom Sweeper is a 2D pixel-style game. Clean up the approaching zombie climax, and exchange it for cash, embarking on a journey to become an arms dealer in the apocalypse. Complete the game, unlock more items in the shop, and achieve various achievements to obtain different CG!

name: CheckMaze
description: CheckMaze brings chess and mazes together and introduces new pieces and mechanics to the classic game of chess. Maneuver your way through a series of mazes filled with portals and traps and more, while utilizing the unique abilities of new pieces to solve tens of handcrafted puzzles.

name: Angrbotha Mountains
description: Angrbotha mountains is a short cinematic, story driven adventure RPG game. Regard it as a short solo RPG session with a game master. Levelling up, meet wandering creatures, putting the story together, making choices, exploring and finding items are important parts to put the events to rest.

name: Snacko
description: Set out for a new life away from the city to rebuild a town from scratch. Decorate, collect, produce, and befriend in this cat-ivating life sim!

name: Gibberish
description: Sin descripción

name: Sugary Shifter
description: Sugary Shifter is a short, turn-based RPG that is easy to understand and finish without any guides. It features graphics inspired by 1980s video games.

name: Fore! Track
description: It's golf… in a tank!

name: Word Trails
description: Connect scrambled letters to create words that fit into a crossword-style puzzle. Solve daily challenges as you level up in this relaxing brain game.

name: Phive Nights At Pico's
description: A remake of the first Five Nights At Freddy's game in PICO-8.

name: Clue/Cluedo: Epic Crime Collection
description: More tangled mysteries await in ten epic Crime Scenes. Find out what happens after Tudor Mansion, at the Black Adder resort. How did every suspect come to be in the same place at the same time? And who murdered Callan Coral?! The plot progresses in this official sequel.

name: Blast Arena
description: Blast Arena is a short arena shooter for SEGA Master System.

name: Clue: Black Adder Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Clue: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fitness Boxing: Fist of the North Star - Expansion Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: A War On Christmas: Part 2
description: A War On Christmas: Part 2 is a 12 map sequel to last year's Christmas rampage. Featuring the things you loved about the original and much, much more!

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Valley of the Zeke Episode
description: Introducing a new story episode including 3 new missions set in Arizona, featuring new characters. As a convoy of survivors flee Phoenix, they’re attacked by the infected and one of its patrol squads is separated from the group. They must race to their rendezvous in Tempe or risk being left behind.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Rushy Gear Pack
description: Admired for their traditional wooden fishing gear, Rushy has become the go-to brand for many anglers. This pack contains the exotic Tribal Rod and the quirky yet classic Helm Reel, available in three color variations each, as well as three frog lures.

name: Fallout 76: Atlantic - City High Stakes Bundle
description: Head to the Boardwalk of Atlantic City and join the High Rollers table with this bundle. The High Stakes Bundle includes bonus in-game C.A.M.P. items and cosmetics like the Casino Quarter C.A.M.P. Kit and the Civic Duty Power Armor.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Fast X Car Pack
description: This blockbuster DLC includes iconic vehicles like the 1970 Dodge Charger, 1966 Chevrolet Impala Super Sport, 1973 Datsun 240Z, 2022 Dodge Charger SRT Hellcat Redeye Widebody, and the 2022 Flip Car 2.0 to drive and race in the Horizon Festival.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Valley of the Zeke Episode
description: Introducing a new story episode including 3 new missions set in Arizona, featuring new characters.

name: Risk: Global Domination - Advanced 2 Map Pack
description: By popular demand it's here. Test out your strategic prowess with these larger and more advanced versions of our most popular maps.

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Burning Skulls Weapons Skin Pack
description: Gear up your arsenal with some fiery flare with the Burning Skulls Weapons Skin Pack, featuring 4 premium skins.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Suzuki Pack 2023
description: Start your engines! Purchase the Suzuki Pack and experience real off-road riding!

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Honda Pack 2023
description: Start your engines! Purchase the Honda Pack and experience real off-road riding!

name: World War Z: Aftermath - Pre-Apocalypse Character Skins Pack
description: Gear up with premium outfits from the time before the zombie apocalypse turned the world upside down.

name: Avorion: Behemoth Event Series
description: "The Behemoths are coming! These legendary ships will now attack helpless sectors - unless someone stops them."

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Winter Blast Style Pack
description: Stay warm all year round with the Winter Blast Style Pack! This pack contains a cosy mix of clothing, off-road vehicle and boat liveries, and emotes, so that you can brave the cold - in style!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Fiskespro Gear Pack
description: Make a statement with the Fiskespro Gear Pack! This pack contains the stained-glass Vredesbringaren Rod and the lavish Härskaren Reel, available in three color variations each, as well as three spinner lures.

name: Animalistic: Last Man on Earth
description: Sin descripción

name: Fallout 76: Atlantic City - Boardwalk Paradise: Deluxe Edition
description: Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of Skyrim and Fallout 4, welcome you to Fallout 76. Twenty-five years after the bombs fell, you and your fellow Vault Dwellers—chosen from the nation's best and brightest - emerge into post-nuclear America on Reclamation Day, 2102. Explore a vast wasteland, devastated by nuclear war, in this open-world multiplayer addition to the Fallout story. Includes the full game and bonus High Stakes Bundle in-game items.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: Gold Edition
description: Explore a magical world in Disney Dreamlight Valley alongside Disney and Pixar friends and expand your journey to Eternity Isle where more adventures await!

name: Hitman World of Assassination: Deluxe Edition
description: Step into the shoes of Agent 47 in the definitive World of Assassination collection. Featuring over 20 iconic locations, hundreds of challenges, and all premium downloadable content in one definitive package.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Pumpkin King Returns
description: The 1.0 update for Disney Dreamlight Valley finishes the Early Access period, brings Jack Skellington from Disney Tim Burton’s The Nightmare Before Christmas as a villager, new multiplayer functions and the Royal Winter Star Path.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time - Chapter 1: Welcome to Eternity Isle
description: The first of 3 chapters of the "A Rift in Time" expansion pack for Disney Dreamlight Valley. Explore Eternity Isle and meet Rapunzel, Gaston, and EVE on your island adventures!

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Surveillance Police Vehicle
description: Technology equals efficiency – and the Surveillance Police Vehicle proves it! Make the lives of traffic offenders harder by patrolling the streets of Brighton in this car and using its exclusive surveillance camera to record a multitude of car-related felonies.

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Guardian Police Vehicle
description: This patrol car is the biggest Brighton police force has to offer. It's a big help fighting crime, allowing you to arrest up to six suspects at a time!

name: Planet Suika
description: Take your Suika stacking skills to a new planetary level in this Casual Puzzle Game! Combine smaller planets together to turn them into larger planets. Master the games Physics to combine the planets until you make a big Sun!

name: Magnavody
description: Experience the magic and weirdness of the world's first home video console, the Magnavox Odyssey, lovingly recreated for modern hardware.

name: Sofi Origins
description: Sofi Origins is an adventure, suspense, and horror game in which you play as Sofi, a girl with a very sad past, but who in her world has powers. Alongside Sofi, you will experience fear and sadness in a unique way. You will have to use your skills and stay focused to confront the past.

name: Inverse Ninjas vs. The Public Domain
description: Fight off increasingly powerful ninjas as some of the most iconic characters of all time in this 2-4 player party game!

name: Rogue Survivalist
description: Choose Knight, Mage, or Rogue. Face enemies on 6 maps, level up, unlock unique abilities, and become a hero in this thrilling action RPG.

name: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus
description: OG Puzzlers: Kira Maus is an casual puzzel game with cute dog images. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Filter World
description: Sin descripción

name: Mystery Box VR: Escape The Room
description: The VR version of the third chapter of the Mystery Box series. Can you crack crazy puzzles to open incredible boxes and escape the room you're trapped in?

name: Futanari Tales
description: There are girls with a twist here! Let's get weird.

name: Time Hunters: Curse of the Golden Idol
description: Are you ready?! Make some noise (and some enemies) in this action-packed party shooter for 4! Utilize your unique energy shots, power-up your attacks with an array of pick-ups, and get set to take down the competition!!

name: ParryRobot
description: ParryRobot is a 3D action game where you play as a tiny but agile robot, “PAR 12-H”. Using the game’s “Parry System”, you are tasked with overcoming the mysterious, hulking “TB 001-L”…a massive automaton who’s set its eyes on your metallic hide!

name: Blush Blush: Kitsune Bundle
description: Three ancient fox-spirits. Three men forever linked by their rivalry… and by the curse they share. Three chances to experience falling in love like never before. This content requires the base game Blush Blush on Steam in order to play.

name: Company of Heroes 3: Hammer & Shield
description: The Hammer & Shield Expansion Pack introduces two new Battlegroups for Multiplayer/ Co-op / SP Skirmish, an all-new Campaign Company for the Italian Campaign, and four premium cosmetic bundles.

name: Snake Galaxy Online
description: Snake Galaxy Online is a 3D game based on the famous Snake. Travel the universe, save the people of the stars and defeat evil in this fun adventure for all ages.

name: Christmas Rocket Pudding
description: A fast-paced 3D platform game. Skillfully control the speed of your pudding to beat the levels fast while avoiding pitfalls!

name: Universal Power
description: Universal power is a fantasy RPG game designed and published by Martia Nouri Namini.

name: All I Want for Christmas Are Subgames
description: A Sleigh-full of Subgames for the Holidays!

name: Under the Castle
description: Under the Castle is a classic rogue game where you'll explore infinite dungeons vanquishing enemies, gathering Orbs of Light and rescuing enslaved villagers. Use your weapons, potions, magic scrolls and even you own hat to navigate the treacherous depths and find your way to the Evil Lord!

name: Overwatch 2: Season 8 - Call of the Hunt
description: Overwatch 2 Season 8: Call of the Hunt adds the newest tank Hero, Mauga, along with Beast Hunter-themed skins in a new Battle Pass.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: A Rift in Time
description: Expand your journey to Eternity Isle, where more adventures await!

name: Sonic Dream Team
description: In this all-new Sonic adventure, the evil Dr. Eggman has discovered The Reverie, an ancient device with the power to manifest dreams in the real world. Navigate twisted dreamscapes, rescue your friends, and put a stop to Dr. Eggman’s nightmarish dreams of world domination!

name: Tram Simulator Urban Transit
description: Welcome to Tram Simulator Urban Transit - get on aboard! In this game, you take on the role of a tram driver and manager. Drive 6 unique tram models. Transport passengers and drive them to the numerous stops. Plan your own routes, manage your timetables, and expand your tram network.

name: Super Retro Retry
description: 100 levels, some are easy, some not, sometimes flipped horizontally, sometimes flipped vertically, always randomized! And ONE SINGLE LIFE. Customize your experience. Are you ready for the ultimate Retro challenge? Are you ready for Retry?

name: Rulers of Aden
description: A fantasy turn-based indie rpg with character customization and enemies that may leave you struggling.

name: This Game Is Easy
description: This Game Is Easy is a game that challenges you. It will test and confuse you. Are you up to the challenge of this super-easy game?

name: Sledders
description: Rev' up your sled & dive into fresh powder in Sledders! Realistic, physics-based snowmobile simulator in backcountries full of deep snow. Ride with and against your friends in online multiplayer. Can you reach the peak before others? Show off your sled-skills now on Sledders.

name: Valor & Victory: Pacific
description: The Pacific War was a theater of immense strategic importance, with nations vying for control over key territories and vital supply routes. Valor & Victory: Pacific 1942 - 1943 plunges you into this theater of war, where the forces of Japan and China join the fray.

name: The Great Below
description: Immerse yourself in a haunting map-based horror experience. Break free from the loop and the mansion where you find yourself while unveiling the secrets underneath it all. The Society expects something from you but are you ready to face the consequences?

name: Hell Miner
description: Hell Miner is a casual indie game. Players play as a mining veteran, mistakenly into hell, encounter various demon girls, fight all the way to the bottom of hell, and finally become the king of hell.

name: Praise Dead
description: Praise Dead is a roguelike auto-battler where you create minions from the parts of dead villagers and monsters. Collect relics that power up your zombies. And defend the town from the nightly demonic incursions that threaten to slay us all.

name: Fallout 76: Atlantic City
description:
Go on a post-apocalyptic getaway in Fallout 76’s Atlantic City Expedition and go on a daring heist for rewards in Season 15: The Big Score

Deemed a “low priority target” when the Great War broke out, Atlantic City is now a premier destination of the wasteland, offering thrilling entertainment, scenic coastal views and even running electricity! Players can now venture out to Atlantic City to complete two new Expedition missions that will get them properly acquainted with the local populace.

Encourage some unsavory business with The Family, Atlantic City’s resident mob, while they try stay off the radar of the Municipal Government keeping the lights on (both literally and figuratively.) Meanwhile, the guild running the city’s entertainment known as The Showmen have a daring gauntlet with glory and riches awaiting those brave (or possibly foolish) enough to enter!

You’ll want to pack more than a spare change of clothes for your trip to Atlantic City, however. Beyond the New Jersey Pine Barrens lie the mutated Overgrown – irradiated, plant-like beasts from deep within the woods encroaching on Atlantic City’s borders. Also keep an eye out for some ferocious lil’ devils spotted in the area – Appalachia isn’t the only place with cryptid spottings, y’know.

name: Ungate
description: The action is about a young man named Jason, who follows the steps of his friends to find them and to get them out of a mysterious cave that has its own ecosystem and is known by the locals of the West Village as the gate of hell...

name: Mr. Bear's Bizarre Adventure
description: This is a paradise for vr, rhythm and ACT lover. It's also a legend about Mr. Bear.

name: Snowmen
description: Escape this infinite snowy realm full of grotesque snowmen by exploring and collecting the ingredients your captor demands in this fairy tale like short X-mas horror game!

name: Life in the Twilight
description: Life in the Twilight - this is a world of hopelessness in which the guardians are looking for you to stop your escape.

name: Walk the Past VR
description: Walk The Past VR is a narrated journey through history. Explore the fortifications and environments of the battle of Cartagena in 1741. Listen to an enthralling voice acted retelling of the events. Find objects around the locations, read beautifully written journals and discover all the landmarks.

name: Arms Race 2
description: Arms Race 2 is PC strategy game based on the historical conflict between the USA and the USSR taken place in 20th century.

name: Princess Dating Sim
description: Princess Dating Sim is an non-linear visual novel where you court multiple princesses at the same time. You'll need to woo them, and see what their tastes are before you can pick a partner to marry! But don't worry, there are no wrong answers here!

name: Legends of Amberland II: The Song of Trees
description: Legends of Amberland II: The Song of Trees is a classic western RPG inspired by great 90s era games such as Might & Magic, Wizardry, Ultima, the Gold Box series. Light, fairy tale, epic, heroic, slightly humorous adventure.

name: Robot Resistors
description: Robot Resistors is a rogue-lite action game with auto-attacking weapons and deep customization. Choose from multiple stages, characters, weapons, and upgrades to make each twenty-minute run unique. Escape your brutal robot overlords or be turned to scrap!

name: Captain Tsubasa: Ace
description: "Captain Tsubasa: Ace" is an officially licensed mobile football game from the "Captain Tsubasa" IP. Players can control characters like Tsubasa Ozora and Kojiro Hyuga, performing breathtaking football moves, re-enacting the fiery battle storylines, exploring various gameplay modes, and reveling in the excitement of football confrontations.

name: RTM: The Last Days
description: As the only survivor of a military plane crash, you find yourself in a mysterious island battling to stay alive and discover the dark secret that lies beneath the ground.

name: Extremely Powerful Capybaras
description: Become the bullet hell with your friends in this chaotic survival roguelite game for 1-4 players. Collect items that unlock weapons and skills, face hordes of enemies and become the mightiest capybaras of all!

name: Judgeball: Lethal Arena
description: 3 vs 3 Dark and violent TPS Sport game with ultra-intense and brutal gameplay in a hostile Cyberpunk arena. Co-op, teamplay and champion customization are crucial in order to optimize your strategy and crush the opposition.

name: Chessarama
description: Chessarama is a collection of chess-inspired puzzle and strategy games that use chess pieces and their established move sets, then reimagines their goals and themes. Solve challenges, unlock collectibles, and compete against each other on the leaderboards. Welcome to Chessarama!

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley
description: Explore a world filled with the magic of Disney as you discover rich stories and build the perfect neighbourhood alongside Disney and Pixar Heroes and Villains in this new life-sim adventure game. Welcome to Disney Dreamlight Valley.

name: A Highland Song
description: Enter the Highlands. Lose yourself. Find harmony. Reach the sea. A narrative adventure with rhythm and survival elements, from the creators of Heaven’s Vault and 80 Days.

name: Blood West
description: Blood West is an immersive stealth shooter taking place in a nightmare version of a classic wild west setting. The player takes on the role of an outlawed gunslinger brought back to live by strange native spirits to find the root of a curse that has befallen the land. They will explore the dangerous frontier, gather supplies, expand their arsenal, and gain experience to unlock special traits, to best the many monsters and face off with challenging bosses.

name: Shores of Plunder
description: Avast ye! Welcome aboard to the ultimate pirate adventure in SHORES OF PLUNDER! Battle friends, outlast hordes of enemies, and amass the greatest fortune in the seven seas. Race against time on a dangerous island filled with treasure, then unwind in a secret pirate cove full of shenanigans.

name: The Anacrusis
description: The Anacrusis is a four-player, cooperative first-person shooter set aboard a massive starship stranded at the edge of explored space. Team up with your friends in an infinitely-replayable fight against alien hordes to unlock perks, weapons, and new ways to play that you can share with your team!

name: Born of Bread
description: Play as a flour golem who possesses a never-ending childlike wonder and a set of odd abilities. Team-up with a colorful cast of characters, explore the different regions of a wonderful world ripe with mysteries and engage in a fun and quirky turn-based combat system.

name: Kingpin: Reloaded
description:
Kingpin: Reloaded is an enhanced re-release of the 1999 first-person shooter Kingpin: Life of Crime.

The enhanced version features 4K resolution, ultrawide support, and improved graphics, more accessible controls, and new quest and conversation systems.

name: Amberial Dreams
description: Play in a cosmical toybox packed with arcade platforming, rhythmical contraptions and colourful worlds.

name: Faeland
description: FAELAND is a 2D Platform Action Adventure Role Playing Indie Video Game currently in development for PC, inspired on the nostalgic 8-Bit classics with a modern charm for all generations.

name: Old Hound of Baker Street
description:
Play as a retired Sherlock Holmes in this text-based murder mystery, where your only eyes on the scene are those of the same person threatening to kill you.

When Sherlock thought his detective life was long over, he finds himself in a new case: solve the murder of the great philanthropist, Mr. Banks, from his office in Baker Street, or die trying.

Be an armchair detective and navigate through dialogue options in order to find the truth. But be careful about how much you press your client and how you word your accusations, or you might not see the next day.

When the client is nervous, your hound instincts will kick in. Will you press forward and try to get the truth, or will you direct the conversation in more subtle ways? Discover who, how, and why, and give the right answers when the time comes.

name: Hentai World: Happy Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Shotgun Shenanigans
description: A multiplayer FPS sports game

name: Detective Face
description: A 2 player pass-n-play deduction game for the Playdate

name: Virus 91
description: Virus 91 is an adventure game with first-person shooter (FPS) elements. You have to take on the role of a sergeant and go to the laboratory, in which all the equipment is out of control. Explore mysterious locations and find out who is behind this whole situation!

name: Rubber Royale: Holiday Prologue
description: Get ready for a frantic experience in this 8-player mayhem of a game. Run, hit, jump and throw your opponents in the wackiest way possible. The only Xmas game that rewards you for being naughty instead of nice.

name: Slippery Delivery
description: Have you ever wanted to be an extremely slippery fish out of water, well look no further!

name: Glowing Abyss
description: Explore the depths of the ocean as a plankton, revive the decaying sea life, and rescue other plankton. Illuminate the ocean floor and bring life back to it!

name: Does It Stack?: Full Stack Edition
description: Get even more creative in Does It Stack? - Full Stack Edition — a physics-based VR puzzle game with an explosive twist! Craft increasingly absurd towers that joyfully defy the laws of physics using a treasure trove of wonky stuff.

name: Synthwave Runner
description: Synthwave Runner is a casual game where you have to jump over different obstacle to keep running and increase your highscore in an stunning synthwave style.

name: Annihilator
