description: A 3D Action-roguelike game,Use different item and weapon to Annihilate the intruders

name: Frontline Battles
description: In this tug of war style strategy game you can send out soldiers to destroy your enemy's bases. Deploy army's comprised of multiple different types of soldiers that each fill a different role. Push across the map to your enemy's HQ and destroy it to win in these short less than 20 minute matches.

name: My Girls’ Secrets
description: This is a "casual" game with beautiful painting style, go through the level and explore the mysterious world, in this world will meet all kinds of girls, in the face of their challenges you should make choices to make them succeed as your girlfriend.

name: ReHarmony
description: The main character finds themselves ensnared within a mysterious realm, and it's up to you to help them avoid getting lost in time. As our hero navigates different time periods, they must activate special keys to control the flow of time.

name: Click Cricket
description: Click Cricket is a single player casual cricket simulation for PC. The simple but engaging gameplay makes each match is unique with its own set of challenges to overcome and ensure victory on the field!

name: Twista
description: The Hardest Game in the World! (I guess.)

name: King of Throwing
description: Author’s suggestion: Use a notepad to record the angles of your throws. Players can aim and throw by clicking the left mouse button, and control the character’s left and right movement by pressing A and D. Control the angle of your throw, you don't want to make a mistake

name: Scream or Die
description: Horror game.

name: Warm Snow: The End Of Karma
description: During the ten years of Bi'an's slumber in the Ash Of Nightmare, the malevolent god Helo was fully unleashed, bringing havoc to the world. The resistance force led by Linglong once glimpsed hope, but in the face of madness and despair, everything seemed so fragile...

name: Yukiusa
description: A game of bouncing snow rabbits!

name: Christmas Nightmare
description: Christmas Nightmare is an atmospheric horror game about New Year's Eve.

name: Monster Crawl: Warrior
description: FREE version of Monster Crawl featuring the Warrior & first few hours of gameplay || Horde based roguelite; slaughter them all with overpowering attacks & annihilate entire rooms. Explore diverse builds using heroes, abilities, buffs & relics. Beat Bosses to unlock Uber Relics. 2 player local co-op.

name: Sanctuary in Time
description: A text-based, adult game with sci-fi & RPG elements!

name: SoundTown
description: An accessible one-button music game for children and young people with complex physical and cognitive needs.

name: Hidden Object Secrets: Family Revenge Collector's Edition
description: As the weary detective investigates the disappearance of a reputable businessman, suddenly evidence of mafia activity resurfaces, along with sorrow-filled events of the past!

name: Home Design 3D VR
description: With Home Design 3D VR, designing and remodeling your house in VR has never been so quick and intuitive! Accessible to everyone, Home Design 3D VR is the reference interior design application for a professional result at your fingertips!

name: Complete
description: Complete is an online co-op survival game where we kill the robots that attack us.

name: Brazil Fencing Club VR
description: The Brazil Fencing Club has nine world-class foil fencers ready to challenge you. Test your fencing skill and see if it holds up against these wacky fencers. Use actual real world fencing skills in a virtual reality game that closely simulates actual real world foil fencing.

name: Sky Fury
description: Hold on tight for this thrilling arcade-style air racing game. Equipped with various weapons, you will need to use strategy and skill to achieve victory. Play in single-player or versus mode and unlock new circuits and planes.

name: RoboCock
description: You are a Robo-Chicken that has been sent to hell for your many evil acts. Now you only have one purpose. Kill!!!

name: Lycans
description: Lycans is a multiplayer game up to 10 players. Investigate during the day to find the hidden werewolves among the villagers and hide at night to survive their attacks!

name: Zombies Wars
description: "Zombies Wars" is a shooting game.The terrifying zombie shooter game immerses players into places infested with horrifying zombies.

name: Mossy Pixels
description: Destroy the mossy cover to reveal ancient drawings underneath! Watch the mysterious patterns get dissolved pixel-by-pixel and just... relax.

name: Floating Girl
description: This is a casual masturbation girl game. You're flying a plane in space looking down on Earth when a bunch of alien spaceships fire at you. You have to survive. As a bonus, survive to the end, and you'll be able to see the floating girl. Head out into space!

name: Cube Royale
description: The agile multiplayer arcade battle royale experience for soldiers of fortune and strategy experts.

name: Legend of the Archer
description: Legend of the archer - the game will tell you the story of a legendary archer who finds himself in the midst of a war between two clans.

name: Cyber Tower
description: Cyber Tower is a 3D cyberpunk Tower Defense game. Defend the city against virus-infected autonomous vehicles across 40 missions. Strategically place towers to eliminate enemies efficiently.

name: Warplanes: Air Corp
description: Engage in combat at the core of the modern battlefield in Warplanes: Air Corp in VR. The third installment of the best-selling Warplanes series introduces a new era of modern military aviation. In addition to fighter jets and multirole combat aircraft you are able to pilot attack helicopters!

name: VRogue
description: Ported directly from the open source project, VRogue is the classic game Rogue in an entirely new perspective: Virtual Reality! Dare the Dungeons of Doom to deliver the Amulet of Yendor... and then find your way back out!

name: Rat it!
description: Rat It is a single-player magic shooter game in VR. As the alchemist, you must wield your powerful slingshot eradicate all the evil monsters on a medieval sailing ship.

name: Next Move
description: Next Move is a VR platformer where all movement corresponds to the player's movement. Your ability to run, jump and climb will be put to the test on a journey into dreamy worlds filled with fantastic architecture. But to succeed, you must also fight off enemies and eventually even manipulate time.

name: Does it Stack?
description: "Does it Stack?" is a physics-based VR puzzle game with an explosive twist. It has a twenty levels each with three challenges and a sandbox mode to explore.

name: Laboratory X-29
description: Laboratory X-29 is a sci-fi roguelite-like top-down shooter, where the protagonist takes his chances to escape from the Lab after an accident. Shoot your way out to freedom, clear rooms full of other dangerous experiments, find out the secrets hidden in this place and eat chicken to survive.

name: Make Way
description: Speed around loops, dart through train crossings, drift around helter skelters, and unleash wacky weaponry in this modern take on classic top-down multiplayer racing games. The twist? You build the track.

name: Arashi: Castles of Sin - Final Cut
description: Become one with the shadows with the award winning VR shinobi adventure. Master the art of stealth-action as you infiltrate castles across feudal Japan with your arsenal of weapons, tools, and techniques, outwitting all enemies on your quest to defeat the Six Oni of Iga.

name: Soulash 2
description: In a realm where gods have perished, a new era of strife has dawned. Seize power, forge legendary artifacts, conquer the world, and ascend to the divine throne in Soulash 2!

name: The Wagadu Chronicles
description: The Wagadu Chronicles is a Role-Play-First Afrofantasy MMORPG featuring multiplayer synchronous turn-based combat, communal settlement building and capture, and a cinematic dialogue mode.

name: Realm of the Fallen
description: VR meets old school FPS meets Metroidvania. Blast, bludgeon, jump, and climb your way through an ancient temple that has been overrun by augmented undead minions. Beware of the Sentinel, a drone that relentlessly hunts intruders. Set in a world with a unique aesthetic and horror elements.

name: War Operation: Full Contact
description: WAR OPERATION: Full Contact is a third-person shooter game, its first early access version features multiplayer network mode and sends you straight back to April 2003, in the heart of Iraq, in the midst of a frighteningly intense confrontation. The Iraqi army against the U.S. Marines, choose your side, your class, your weapons and run through the streets of Baghdad, near Firdos Square, frozen in the days of Saddam Hussein's regime. A unique and exceptional experience never seen before.

name: House Builder VR
description: Travel around the world and through the ages to build iconic designs! Beware unpleasant temperatures and dangerous fauna! Now in VR to fully immerse in the adventure...

name: Picayune Dreams
description: Adrift across the void, you must fend off thousands of nightmarish and otherworldly creatures. You're never at rest, as you weave between horde survival and bullet hell gameplay. Test new builds, and improve through roguelite meta progression. And don't forget. You mu [Transmission Interrupted...]

name: Svarog's Dream
description: Awaken as a soul from the Underworld. Discover who you are and explore an ever-changing open world full of mystery. Fight the beasts and gods or ally with them. Die and be reborn in this unforgettable adventure.

name: Cereal Killer
description: Follow Milton, a farmer who witnesses strange events on his farm until he realizes that his cereal plantation is more alive than it should be..

name: Where is Mrs Peregrine?
description: A precious family member is missing! She's old, and the weather is pretty cold... Let's search for her!

name: I want 5 quadrillion yen!
description: 5000兆円欲しい! (Gosen Cho-yen Hoshii!) is an internet meme which had been prevailed in Japan in 2017. Capture money with a goal of 5 quadrillion yen.

name: Link's Awakening DX HD
description:
Dive into the enchanting world of The Legend of Zelda: Link's Awakening DX as you've never experienced it before, with this meticulously crafted PC version that breathes new life into this classic adventure. Immerse yourself in the nostalgia of Koholint Island with enhanced graphics and widescreen support, bringing the charming landscapes and characters to vivid detail on your modern PC display.

But that's not all – we've turbocharged the gameplay with high framerate support, ensuring that every sword swing, puzzle solve, and enemy encounter feels smoother and more responsive than ever. Rediscover the magic of this timeless Zelda title with improved performance, letting you explore dungeons, uncover secrets, and engage in epic battles with unparalleled fluidity.

Whether you're a long-time fan of Link's Awakening or a newcomer to the series, this PC version offers a fresh take on the beloved classic, combining the essence of the original with cutting-edge enhancements. Embark on a journey across the mysterious island, solve puzzles, meet quirky characters, and relive the adventure with a level of polish and finesse that pays homage to the legendary legacy of The Legend of Zelda.

The game was taken down by Nintendo.

name: Goonya Monster: Buster - Iwasake-chan/Fake Type
description: Sin descripción

name: Goonya Monster: Buster - Lord Ham/Fake Type
description: Sin descripción

name: Goonya Monster: Fake Type - Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tony Hawk's Sonic McOrigins Plus Christmas
description: Tony Hawk's Sonic McOrigins Plus Christmas is an update for Sonic McOrigins, which includes the ESPN reskins of the 2004 games, featuring everyone's favorite Sonic characters: Tony Hawk, Vince Carter, and more!

name: Altitude Adjustment
description: It has been a year since you exchanged gifts with the UAC scientists and they have already gotten themselves into trouble. As it turns out, many of them were assigned to a UAC airship to investigate some new portal technology. However, the last communication you received contained some demonic screeching, so something has clearly gone wrong. Time to make a grand entrance and bring the scientists another gift; their freedom!

name: Lord of Darkness: Aftermath
description: Lord of Darkness: Aftermath is the second game in the Lord of Darkness series, made in a similar pixel style and JRPG genre. Together with the blue-haired hero and his friends, we have to go on crazy adventures, because the world is in serious danger again.

name: Volcanic Bird: Bird Quest
description: Volcanic Bird: Bird Quest fuses a traditional JRPG combat system with creature collecting and a text-adventure style game structure.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 5 - Underground
description:
Catch the train, customize your weapon, and claim your revenge in Chapter 5 - Underground:

Fortnite Battle Royale takes on a striking new appearance in Underground. Discover an entirely new Island with POI's that feature the factions of The Society versus the Underground. Seek your revenge for the kidnapping of poor Peely with an entirely fresh arsenal of weapons and items. And of course with a new season, you’ll find the Big Bang Battle Pass with pages of new cosmetics. Check out the line up of Outfits geared up and ready for action from daybreak until dawn.

name: The Curse of the Egyptian Pyramid: Remaster Edition
description: A first-person horror game about Egypt. Explore the scary secret of the mysterious pyramid. In order to protect the heroes from danger, the player can use the characters' cameras to see a ghostly entity and anomalies invisible to the human eye.

name: Sweet Home: Look and Find - Collector's Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the comfort and tranquility of home as you relax and enjoy finding objects, solving puzzles, and conquering mini-games in this cozy and clever new hidden object game from Avi Games!

name: Blades and Bullets
description: In 1939 Grand Emperor Hil’Tar a high elf who has set his sights for Poland which would spark the start of the Second World war. Hundreds of miles away across the ocean, you a young American working out of his parent's farm, learns of the fatal news that war in the Kingdom of Europe has broken out.

name: Cubitrix
description: Get creative with our variety of bricks and create unique buildings and structures that stand out. With Cubitrix, building impressive architectural wonders is at your fingertips.

name: Twistingo: Hummingbird Haven Collector's Edition
description: Restore paradise in 'Hummingbird Haven'! Uncover hidden nests, rescue animals, and rebuild a sanctuary. Your journey awaits in this thrilling hidden object fun with challenging puzzles!

name: Super Cave Run
description: Lose your patience, peace and tranquility, trying to save Hat Man from the most dangerous cave in the world.

name: Survival Circle
description: College students trapped in collapsed buildings. Stranger things going on inside the building.

name: Adult Puzzle: My Cute Neighbor Serene
description: This is Serene. Are you feeling stressed? Don't worry. Serene is here to help you..

name: Rogues of Europa
description: Rogues of Europa is a gothic roguelike RPG. Fight the physical and metaphysical evils brewing below the surface of a rapidly modernizing society.

name: Run Ran! Side Scrollers
description: Random stage generation. The length of the stages can be freely determined. You can freely decide the length of each stage, so you can play quickly in your spare time or take your time. Enjoy always fresh play and challenge your own limits in Time Attack.

name: Explosive Madness
description: Explosive Madness is an exciting game about physics and destruction. You have to destroy various structures using tools and explosives! In the game you will find many exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.

name: Magic Force
description: Magic Force is a 3D adventure game. You have to take on the role of a traveler who went in search of new adventures. Explore a mysterious continent that has been poisoned and help the locals find an antidote.

name: VonGarland Castle: Sacrilege of the Night
description: VonGarland Castle : Sacrilege of the Night a love letter to action platformer classics like Castlevania, Super Metroid and Mega Man X.

name: Curse of Blood
description: This is a game about survival and betrayal. Ten explorers ventured to the corrupted land to prevent the arrival of the Blood Moon. The bad news is that there are werewolves and vampires mixed in.

name: Granvil's Fairytale
description: Granvil's fairytale is an interesting and challenging platform adventure that gives you a lot of satisfaction. By controlling the movements of the dwarf, you need to show above-average dexterity to move on to the next stage. At the same time, you will see an world full of obstacles and surprises!

name: Rising Up
description: Unleash office mayhem! Leaving a trail of paperwork, shattered furniture, and fallen co-workers as you battle your way to the top!

name: Yoru no Kasou
description:
I walk around.
Sometimes something falls down.
Burn it.
There are 30 △ in total.
It's just a game of exploration.
There is no story.

name: Bike Rampage!
description: Dan the Biker has one goal... Run over everything with his bike.

name: 5-min-Clue
description: 5-min-Clue is small one-player RPG about being an amateur detective that somehow keeps getting involved in murder mysteries. There's no puzzle to solve, the die will tell you who, where, and how; you will have to think quick about the why, and deliver a summation worthy of the best amateur sleuths. Or not, just have fun.

name: Rota
description: Use your Playdate's crank to swing from anchor to anchor as you try to beat your high-score while avoiding the inevitable.

name: Alien Nah'Topsy
description:
Destroy the Evidence!

Evade the authorities by helping our little dude push the alien DNA evidence into the garbage and escape into his UFO.

name: Voice of the Ancients
description:
Let me tell you a story! Meanwhile, you can sit at the fireplace, close your eyes, and listen to the tale about ancient hidden treasures and secret societies. This time, you won't just listen. You will be the hero of the story. It will be your adventure. Your voice guides the way. Can you solve the mystery just with your voice?

My game is highly optimized for blind and visually impaired people (thanks to the extensive testing by the Applevis forum members). Still, I developed the game also for other kinds of users:
For intermediate and advanced English learners, this game offers an unparalleled opportunity to enhance your spoken English skills.
And for all adventure enthusiasts, this game rekindles the power of imagination, often stifled by the graphical grandeur of modern video games.
Unleash your inner detective and unravel the mysteries that lie ahead, solely using your voice as your compass.
With the first episode available for free, what are you waiting for? Embark on this extraordinary journey today and discover the magic of storytelling through voice.

name: Sonic CD: Miracle Edition
description:
As the earliest remastered of the classic Sonic Titles, Sonic CD has fewer changes and features compared to later remasters and Origins.

The purpose of this mod is to bring Sonic CD more in-line with the later remasters/Origins by adding several new features/options originally available in other mods.

name: Dynamate: Playdate
description: A Puzzle game where you need to remove the pieces in a predefined way.

name: Stroke The Animals
description: Sin descripción

name: College Sex: Episode 5
description: A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, they go back to their dorm room with their dates after a night of clubbing.

name: Aquarium Land: Baby Seal Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fall Cars: Ultimate Car Battle
description: Prove your mettle on the track and strive to become the ultimate racing champion!

name: Orb in Wonder
description: This is a puzzle game with simple rules. Complete the missions given in each stage to clear the game and enjoy exciting encounters and interactions with numerous heroines!

name: Cyber Horny
description: Cyber Horny - is an exciting 2D game, the essence of which is to find paired colors. And as a reward, you will receive an image with an incredibly beautiful girl. This game will give you aesthetic pleasure. Everything in Cyber Horny is aimed at making you experience the real pleasure of this game!

name: Jewel Craft Fusion
description: Explore cosmic wonders in "Jewel Craft Fusion." Match gems, solve puzzles, and unlock ancient cosmic secrets. Dive into a celestial odyssey of brilliance!

name: The Final Countdown
description: Sin descripción

name: Icharko
description: Become that military hero - go through step-by-step trials, be tactful and think through every move you make before you go into the open. Experience the taste of military action of the 2000s.

name: DIY Paper Doll
description: Become a doll stylist and design fabulous outfits for your adorable paper princess!

name: Not Burned Evil
description: The attractive and terrifying game "Got Burned Evil" is an exciting 2D horror with a side view that immerses the player in a mysterious world of tragedies and riddles.

name: Divergence
description: Explore a mysterious island with the help of a time manipulation device. Rewind and diverge from your current timeline to combat the ancient guardians and discover the secrets behind Titans.

name: The Maze Contract
description: The Maze Contract is a single player retro action game with vector-style graphics. It takes a lot of inspiration from the 1980's shoot-em-up arcade games, but with added tactical elements and lots of upgrades for your ship and weapons.

name: Mysterious legend
description: This is a very adventurous exploration game.

name: Conjury
description: Collect cards, weapons, and items as you make your way through this fast-paced deck building rogue-like to escape the eternal darkness of Lumtham woods.

name: City of Death
description: Welcome friends who love adventure and are eager to explore to the Adventure Island.

name: White Wolf: Treasure Hunter 2
description: Free yourself from the Dark Magic of the Mystical Chest?!

name: Gesshoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Graveyard Shift
description: Graveyard Shift is about a man who is sent to guard a cemetery on his first day of work. his duty is to watch over this place. However, with the coming of night And be heard paranormal sounds and observing strange things through CCTV cameras, he realize that this is not just a terrifying place.

name: SpaceDRG
description: SpaceDRG is a high-octane, motion sickness inducing action game featuring cute pixel art graphics. Fight against the letters D, R & G in a space themed 1980s retro arcade environment.

name: Yeon-oh and Seo
description: Success and failure, love and friendship, dream and reality. The story about our choices in the meantime. A real passionate romance interactive game.

name: Ronnarium
description: An aquarium where a huge tank called "Ronnarium" is on display. There is a rumor that if one enters the aquarium at night, he or she will be "divinely bewitched". A girl named "Yocto" hears the rumor and visits the aquarium to confirm the truth.

name: Conquered Dread
description: Conquered Dread is a First Person survival horror game where the player is a young man who is trying to save his friend from a cave. Choose your path to explore places full of paranormal events and notes written by victims.

name: Furry BDSM
description: Furry BDSM - is a classic 2D game in the memory genre which is about you find the same pictures and enjoy different images of furry beautiful ladies.

name: Cyberference
description: Fight terrorists and robots in this old-school fast paced first person shooter. Grab a friend to help you put an end to their terror with split screen support or each enjoy your own monitor with dual monitor support.

name: Striving for Light: Survival
description: Striving for Light: Survival brings the exploration of infinite expanding skill trees to the arena survival roguelite genre. Unlock new characters, weapons, skills and maps, slay hordes of monsters and take on massive boss fights.

name: Pretend it's not There
description:
You are a young student returning home from school, burdened by an unsettling presence of something following you. You convince yourself that if you ignore it, it will leave you alone. But as you close your front door, a horrible realization sets in—it followed you inside.

Left alone with the monster in the house, you must carry out your nightly routine, pretending not to notice it's presence.

name: Shape
description: A minimalist style but inside a complex-minded With connecting word mechanism, you can make a rule for your rooms and solve the problem. Solve the puzzle and go to the door to the next room. explore new mechanism

name: Dixit World
description:
Dixit World is the adaptation of the famous board game Dixit.

While keeping in mind the originality of the game, the game on mobile application is a unique experience by taking advantage of the support of the video game.
Enjoy the classic gameplay of Dixit or create and share your Worlds with your friends.

name: Slime Castle
description:
The bad humans are invading the mysterious forest! The slime kingdoms in the forest are facing a tremendous crisis!

As a slime chosen by the Slime Sage, you can enhance your abilities through battles, collect legendary equipment, utilize powerful skills, defeat waves of terrifying enemies, and safeguard the peace of the forest.

Once you are defeated, come back stronger!

Slime Castle is a role-playing idle tower defense game.

Players could enjoy an excellent role development system, countless powerful weapons, and several impressive battle scenes.

name: Have Your Monster
description: An experimental interactive poem about toxic lesbians ripping each other apart, under 800 words with 2 outcomes

name: Dormant
description: The game's story is about the mental torture of an individual who lived in a hostile and isolated environment. Little issues with no way to vent build up until the victim lashes out.

name: Reydllom
description:
A dark search for an evil witch begins.
Can you survive?

name: The First Round
description:
It's Friday night and we're late to the pub!

Join Mario as he journeys through a series of short but fun levels suitable for even the newest of players. Unlock routes, meet new friends, and awaken your kaizo skills on what is likely Mario's most vital mission yet: avoiding to pay for drinks!

Features:
- Mostly vanilla beginner romhack suitable for both new and experienced kaizo players
- Unlockable routes of progressive difficulty, up to three unique courses!
- Four unlockable endings, including a secret "true" ending
- Progressive save feature; pick up right where you left off!
- Interactive characters old and new, with a charming narrative
- Custom artwork
- Post-credit content

Remember: last one to the pub buys THE FIRST ROUND! Good luck!

name: Ufo snowboard
description: Interstellar snowboard odyssey across comic worlds! Dynamic weather, day-night cycles, breathtaking landscapes, plus online survival races with others.

name: Brutal Company Plus
description:
A fully customisable Lethal Company hardtype mode, that, adds:

- Over 20+ Unique Events and Counting.
- Custom Quota Start Values & increased progression rates.
- Increased Spawn Rates.
- Any Moon ALL Enemies.
- Increased Loot Drop Rates.

name: Scaleton
description: A puzzle-platformer browser game. Part of the Lemniscate Games series.

name: Adieu Those In Love
description: It's the 2000s, and in a certain village, a delinquent has just returned to her new normal life from the detention center for a crime she didn't commit. Little does she know what awaits her...

name: Oven Dodgers
description: Oven Dodgers is a third-person low poly arcade platformer inspired by historic testimonies.

name: Briley Witch Chronicles 2
description: A Japanese-inspired RPG for the C64

name: Official Spacefarer Card Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Level Devil
description: Level Devil is a platformer with a mean twist. The goal is simple; get to the door at the end of the level to win, but it's not as easy as it may seem... Holes can show up out of nowhere, spikes can move unexpectedly and ceilings can fall down on you as you make your way through the many different levels. One wrong step and it's game over. You'll have to keep your wits about you, expect the unexpected and most importantly: don't get angry. Can you make it through these hellish levels and beat Level Devil?

name: Six Minute Showdown
description: Six Minute Showdown is an unique DOOM II map by Vytaan featuring rhytmic elements. The map responds to the music's beat and will end at exactly six minutes, it requires quick reaction time as well as developed combat skills to keep up the pace.

name: Madvent Calendar 4: End Of The Line
description:
The infection is spreading like wild fire. Just one year after the New Spook City incident and every major city is crawling with Mourning Folk.

No one can shake the feeling that things are getting worse. Something is about to break, but maybe a new season of Madvent can stave off the inevitable for a bit longer.

The world is lonelier than ever before.

name: 1 Square
description: A jumping puzzle game with the goal of getting rid of the numbered boxes by jumping on them. Each jump knocks their number down by one. They fade away when they hit zero.

name: Legendary Road Online
description: Legendary Road Online is a MMORPG that puts the player deep into ancient Chinese, Islamic, and European civilizations. The Legendary Road, was in short, a major cultural and economic trading gateway.

name: Precipitous
description: 6 vanilla maps made for PafWADMo 2021

name: SteamWorld Build & Dig Bundle
description: The ultimate SteamWorld experience. Get your hands on SteamWorld Build, the newest entry in the SteamWorld franchise, as well as the game that started it all, SteamWorld Dig!

name: Santa's Chimney Quest
description: Help Santa to deliver at time

name: Train Simulator Classic: DB BR 218 'V 164'
description: A German diesel legend, the DB BR 218 'V 164' arrives for Train Simulator from Virtual Railroads.

name: Sker Ritual: Bloody Night
description: He knows if you've been bad or good! Bloody Night, featuring a new mask alongside a Premium menu background and more!

name: Nightscape City
description: Nightscape City is nightclub management simulation. Manage your nightclub, buy new music, unlock new drinks, grow your empire!

name: Apocalypse Party
description: "Apocalypse Party" is a 3D top-down action Roguelike game. It's the brand-new sequel to "Plague Project Zero"! A new mission has begun! You will travel to the medieval era, where you'll gradually master firearms, melee weapons, magic, cursed witchcraft, summoning, and more. Through your choices, equip yourself to become the ultimate survivor. Before the apocalypse arrives, have one last wild celebration with your teammates!

name: WooLoop: Advent Pack
description: This Advent-themed gallery unlocks 24 additional levels for WooLoop! Working as an advent calendar, open one image per day to count down the days until Christmas! Celebrate the Chrismas Season in Style

name: My Tsundere Femboy
description: My Tsundere Femboy is a short erotic kinetic visual novel where you play as the typical depiction of a gooner protagonist, a wanker and a loser, who's about to get involved in an exciting adventure with her landlady's effeminate son.

name: Idle Percent
description: Every upgrade in this game is a percent which is added to the upgradable value. Your progression is slow at the beginning but with time your income will become higher and higher! Buy prestige and super prestige upgrades to maximize your profit!

name: Notice
description: NOTICE is a 7-10 minute short interactive experience that follows the story of having a panic attack, then using awareness and presence to overcome it. As you get home and start to breathe, you take control over your thoughts. By clicking on each object, you start to become aware of everything in your space and what it means to you. Each object has its own style, musical note and meaning - whether that be the can of soda lying on your desk or the guitar gifted to you from a friend back home.

name: Only Up Samarkand
description: Only up Samarkand is a parkour game where speed and agility are important so as not to fall and start again! Reaching the end is an important milestone in the game.

name: Epic Pizza
description: Epic Pizza - The People of Calzonia are hungry for Pizza. You have to Race against Time to get it to them.

name: Revenge of the Ronin
description:
This is a story of two fathers, each trying to save their daughters.
A Tale Of Rage, Revenge, And Redemption.
This is a Third-person hack and slash RPG game.
Fight gods and demons to save the people you love.
Upgrade your character and unlock new abilities to become more powerful and defeat your enemies.

name: Hazeron Starship
description: Explore and colonize a vast universe. Discover resources. Build cities. Make spacecraft. Walk aboard them. Operate their controls. Command a crew of NPCs. Lift off. Fly up through the atmosphere to outer space. Land on other worlds, anywhere, not at designated places. Build an empire.

name: Void Guard
description: Follow the Void Guardian as she inspects a space station after receiving a distress beacon from it and help her vanquish the hidden evil.

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash
description: Swing into action and tee off on the craziest golf course ever with Uzzuzzu pack!

name: Forgotten Knight
description: It's a turn-based deck building RPG based on 2D dots. In an environment where attacks work differently on each turn, set the best strategy to defeat your enemies and upgrade your equipment to be stronger!

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Winter Whimsy
description: 1 Brand New Table with online leaderboards and unlockable cosmetics! Ultra-wide winter themed table with 2 plungers and multi-ball madness.

name: HoloParade
description: Collect your favorite characters, nurture them, and have fun just watching in this hololive fan game! It's a 2D tower defense game that offers depth for dedicated players, strategic elements, and easy enjoyment for casual players.

name: 100 Christmas Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Christmas Cats.

name: 100 Christmas Cats
description: Can you find 100 adorable cats hidden in Christmas streets? Test your attention in this cozy charming hand-drawn hidden object game. 100 Christmas Cats are waiting for you in the BEST hidden objects game! ️‍ Can you find them all? ️‍

name: CodeX
description: CodeX is a first person adventure game with a thrilling story told via environmental storytelling. Will you be able to solve the mystery of your past?

name: Goofy Gorillas
description: Relive your childhood nostalgia at Goofy Gorillas, the largest virtual jungle gym! Battle it out with your friends in a wide range of casual but intense PvP gamemodes, or chill out and take part in some extra activities around the venue! Make the Goofy experience your own!

name: GuildMestar
description: Control, defend, and manage a guildhall in this fantasy, party based, card battler with a heavy focus on trading. Your journey will take you through many procedural generated dungeons on your quest for power.

name: Into The Noid
description: An atmospheric and enjoyable Noid-like VR brick breaker. With simple, fun mechanics it's ready to deliver both the casual and skill-based experience in addictive bites.

name: Time Loop
description: Time Loop is a 2D platformer with hardcore elements, dynamic gameplay and nice graphics. In this game you need to pass a variety of levels and avoid enemies.

name: William and Sly: Classic Collection
description: The world of William and Sly is yours to explore, seeking out collectables and secrets, while soaking in the tranquil visuals and melancholic soundtrack. In this pair of classic Flash games, you play as a fox, running and leaping through an atmospheric ecosystem entirely at your own pace.

name: Infected: Outpost
description: Gather resources, refuel the generator, and escape the facility before time runs out! But beware, the infected can steal the skins of their victims. Face your friends in a social deduction horror game like no other!

name: Incarnation
description: A mouse-only reverse roguelike platformer. After each level, you must lose one of your celestial powers until you are completely transformed into a human. Will you be able to reach mortality?

name: Battlechat
description: As a content creator you will be able to interact with your followers through this game. Let them compete against each other while you direct the game or be another player.

name: Chaperone
description: Chaperone is a first-person psychological horror game. The events are completely real. Supernatural events taking place in an atmospheric and constricting closed house, events of unknown cause. You can enjoy being scared to the fullest.

name: Age of Advent
description: Welcome to the Age of Advent! Play four minigames based on the members of Hololive -Advent-! Save the Moai with Bijou, make a soup with Nerissa, try not to crash with FuwaMoco, and avoid the gaze of Shiori!

name: Smoking Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to relax and have a good smoke in an atmospheric village? Then you are exactly at the right place - take a drag on your cigarette and go ahead and explore our wonderful world.

name: Pen Pals
description: Things are going HAYwire down at the farm! Corral a herd of particularly round barnyard friends back into the pen. When two matching animals bump into each other, you'll find an even larger animal in their place. Things get crowded quickly, so do your best in Pen Pals!

name: Unreal Mashup
description: Unreal Mashup will test your gaming ability with a solid 3rd person shooter base experience. Fight against bots or join your friends in their personal server automatically created at every login. This high pace futuristic shooter is Fast!

name: Idle Progress
description: Idle Progress - A free idle game where your task is to produce as many resources as possible, improve your weapons and armor for good attacks, create good fishing rods for a good catch and get legendary items by completing legendary quests.

name: Urban Flow: X-Mas Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooking Arena: 9 in 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hockey Legacy Manager 24
description: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional hockey team!

name: Ord-Upp
description: Ord-upp is a puzzle game where the purpose is to create words from fallings letters. There is also an alternative mode where numbers and operators must be combined in a way to meet a target number.

name: Sexy Strippers
description: Sexy Strippers - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: ShadowStorm
description: Discover a chaotic future where the intensity of battles reaches unparalleled heights. Get ready for action and join the battlefield (up to 16 players in multiplayer) or take on bots in solo mode. ShadowStorm: strategy and boldness will lead you to victory!

name: Kagidoko: A Deep Learning Horror Game
description: Kagidoko is an experimental horror game where every jumpscare has a reason. Collect all keys, open all doors, and get out of that house... While being stalked by a Deep Learning Gameplay AI.

name: Project Subtrahend
description: Project Subtrahend is a choose-your-own-adventure visual novel, where you’ll have the chance to get to know the stories, pasts, and personalities of nine unique characters. Choices matter in this game, and it's up to you who lives or dies as you explore what it means to be human.

name: Savanna Story Diamond Edition
description: The fate of Savannah is in your hands!

name: Alice and The Ancients
description: Advance forward, surpassing all the Ancients on the battlefield!

name: Cat Legend
description: The countless backyard gardens managed by Meow were simultaneously invaded by Mutant Lords. The situation was urgent, and the lively and kind-hearted Hakimi rushed out to defeat the Mutant Invaders, counterattack the Mutant Lords, and end the Source of Mutation.

name: Journey's Legend
description: Embark on an epic adventure in Journey's Legend! Choose from four unique characters, each armed with their own set of three powerful active abilities and a devastating ultimate ability. Find powerful relics to even further enhance them.

name: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker
description: Block Breakin' Logic Downstacker is a puzzle game where you reveal a beautiful image hidden behind the stack of blocks using block breaking logic.

name: ManaSoul
description: ManaSoul is a 2D Pixel Art MORPG where you create and play as your own unique Mage in a world of magic. Play solo or with friends and take on challenges, solve puzzles, and explore the beautiful hand crafted open world.

name: Cats Hidden in Jingle Jam
description: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden around a festive holiday village in this FREE hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Beneath the Earth: Backrooms
description: Beneath The Earth - Backrooms is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with at least 1 and up to 4 players. Where you and your friends will fight to escape from the different levels of the backrooms, solving different puzzles.

name: EscapeMono
description: Point & click to interact with strange creatures, find items, and solve puzzles in a dark, locked lab. Then just escape...?

name: Pew Pew Squad
description: In Pew Pew Squad, battle zombies in a post-apocalyptic setting. Take out the undead, buy new weapons, and up your odds of survival. Fast-paced action and constant challenges await you in this thrilling game!

name: Omg! Not Another Isekai
description: Seo literally wakes up in the lap of a beautiful girl from another world. A world filled with sword fighting, magic spells, and legendary beasts. Follow Seo and learn more about this brand new world! Make choices that affect dialogue and the game's ending.

name: 100 Pumpkins 2
description: Explore, solve puzzles, and fight your way through over 100 screens and return your pumpkin pals!

name: Data Garden
description: A text-less comic-game hybrid about data, interaction and digital identity playable with only one button.

name: Initial Daydream
description: Initial Daydream is a Pulp RPG in the style of NES JRPGs, specifically the early Dragon Quest and Final Fantasy entries. Towns, dungeons, turn based battles, goofy plot and dialogue; you name it, we got it!

name: The Red Juggernaut
description: "The Red juggernaut" is a retro-style JPRG crossed with a modular ship building & combat game. Level up your ship, build it bigger, battle enemy ships, explore the solar system, and save the human race!

name: Pestilence
description: Pestilence is a first-person stealth game in which you play as the Lord of the Pestilence, a betrayed God who seeks revenge against his brothers. Make use of your uncanny abilities to infiltrate this Spanish inspired city and infect their leaders.

name: Quest Giver
description: You're an NPC who gives quests to heroes. Play through 7 scenarios in this humorous narrative adventure with management sim gameplay and a real sassy manager. Now get to work!

name: Hexle
description: A little number-guessing game inspired by Sudoku with hexadecimal numbers and binary restrictions, presented in a minimalist style. Infinite puzzles, daily challenges and weekly megaboards!

name: Zero Conflict TD
description: Fight alien invasion through 30 regions and save the planet. Each level will test you in new and challenging ways. Test your skill and stop the invasion once and for all.
